chapter.verse: Tohe'i-mi Kareba Lompe', tutura katuwu' -na Yesus Kristus, Ana' Alata'ala.

Tutura-na ntepu'u ngkai karata-na Yohanes Topeniu'. Karata-na Yohanes toei, telowa ami' -mi hi rala sura nabi Yesaya. Hante wiwi nabi, Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki Ana' -na hewa toi: Hi'a toi-mi suro-ku, kuhubui-i meri'ulu ngkai Iko, bona mporodo ohea-nu."
"Mekio' -i hi papada to wao', na'uli': `Neo' rata-imi Pue'! Porodo ami' -miki ohea-na. Nipakalempe ami' -mi ohea to natara mpai'.'"

Hewa to ra'uki' toe, mehupa' mpu'u-imi Yohanes Topeniu' hi papada to wao'. Mpoparata-i Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea, na'uli': "Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pai' kana tumai-koi kuniu' bona Alata'ala mpo'ampungi jeko' -ni."

Wori' tauna to hilou hi papada to wao' doko' mpo'epe lolita-na Yohanes. Ria-ra ngkai ngata Yerusalem pai' ngkai hawe'ea ngata hi tana' Yudea. Hilou-ra mpangaku' jeko' -ra, pai' naniu' -ra hi ue Yordan, tanda kamedea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra.
Pohea-na Yohanes rababehi ngkai wulu porewua to rahanga' unta. Salepe' -na ngkai kuliba. Koni' -na lari pai' ue wani.
Mpopalele-i kareba toi: "Ngkabokoa' ngkai aku', tumai mpai' to meliu kuasa-na ngkai aku'. Bangku' mowilingkudu mpobongka koloro sapatu' -na, uma-a-kuwo natao.
Aku' mponiu' -koi hante ue tanda kamedea-ni ngkai jeko' -ni. Aga Hi'a mpai' mponiu' -koi hante Inoha' Tomoroli'."
Rala-na ha'eo, Yesus me'ongko' ngkai ngata Nazaret hi tana' Galilea, tumai mpopeniu' hi Yohanes. Yohanes mponiu' -i hi ue Yordan.
Wae ka'oti-na raniu', mencore-imi ngkai ue, pai' mpohilo-imi langi' mobea pai' Inoha' Tomoroli' mana'u tumai molence mpo-danci mangkebodo hompo hi Hi'a.
Alata'ala mololita ngkai langi' mpo'uli' -ki: "Iko toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Iko-mi to mpakagoe' nono-ku."
Oti toe, Inoha' Tomoroli' mpakeni Yesus lou hi papada to wao'.
Opo' mpulu' eo-i hi ria. Bula-na hi papada toe, Magau' Anudaa' mposori-i. Binata to me'ila dohe-na, pai' mala'eka mpomawai-i.
Ko'ia mahae ngkai ree, Yohanes Topeniu' rahoko' pai' -i ratarungku'. Nto'u toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' Galilea, pai' -i mpopalele Kareba Lompe' to ngkai Alata'ala,
na'uli': "Neo' rata-mi tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'! Medea-mokoi ngkai jeko' -ni, pangala' -mi Kareba Lompe'."
Bula-na momako' hi wiwi' rano Galilea, mpohilo-i rodua tauna. Hanga' -ra: Simon hante Andreas ompi' -na. Nto'u toe, bula-ra mebau' hi rano mojala', apa' toe-mi-rawo bago-ra.
Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Mai-mokoi ntuku' -a! Uma-pokoi mebau' mpali' uru. Ngkai wae lau, kuwai' -koi pobago mpotudui' tauna mepangala' hi Aku'."
Karapalahii-nami jala' -ra, pai' ntepu'u eo toe mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.
Napaliliu-mi Yesus momako', ko'ia molaa ngkai ree mpohilo wo'o-imi rodua to ntali ompi': Yakobus pai' Yohanes, ana' -na Zebedeus. Hira' toe, bula-ra mpokolompehii jala' -ra hi rala sakaya.
Nakio' -ramo mpotuku' -i. Jadi', rapalahii-mi tuama-ra hi rala sakaya hante tauna to dohe-ra to ngkoni' gaji', pai' mpotuku' Yesus-ramo.
Ngkai ree, Yesus hante topetuku' -na hilou hi ngata Kapernaum. Hi eo pepuea' to Yahudi, mesua' -imi hi rala tomi posampayaa pai' natepu'u-mi metudui'.
Konce-ramo tauna to mpo'epe tudui' -na. Apa' uma-i metudui' hewa guru-guru agama. Petudui' -na, hewa tauna to mokuasa mpu'u.
Nto'u toe, ria hadua tauna to nahawi' anudaa', mesua' wo'o-i-hawo hi tomi posampayaa toe, pai' -i mejeu':
"Ee Yesus to Nazaret! Doko' nupopai-dakaie? Ba doko' nuropuhi-dakaie? Ku'inca moto-kole, ka'Iko-na Suro to moroli' ngkai Alata'ala-e."
Yesus mpo'uli' -ki anudaa' toei: "Ngkaba'i-ko! Palai-ko ngkai tauna tetui!"
Tauna toei moridi' sabana anudaa', pai' -i me'au, pai' malai-mi anudaa' to mpohawi' -i.
Konce omea-ramo tauna to mpohilo, alaa-na momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Uma mowo-e'! Toi-e tudui' to bo'u, ria mpu'u baraka' -na! Mpopalai-i anudaa', bo ratuku' mpu'u-diki-hana hawa' -nae!"
Ngkai ree, kamolele-nami kareba to mpotompo'wiwi Yesus hobo' hi tana' Galilea.
Kanculii' -ra Yesus hante ana'guru-na ngkai tomi posampayaa toe, hilou-ramo hi tomi-ra Simon pai' Andreas. Yakobus pai' Yohanes hilou wo'o dohe-ra.
Hi ria, piniana-na Simon tobine ntora turu apa' ngkelengi' -i. Rapesahui mpo'uli' -ki Yesus kapeda' -na.
Ngkai ree, hilou-imi Yesus hi poturua-na, nakamu pale-na pai' napopemata-i. Ncaliu mo'uri' -imi, pai' -i mpolayani-ra.
Ncimonou' toe, limpa-mi eo, wori' tauna tumai hi Yesus mpokeni hawe'ea to peda' ba to nahawi' seta.
Wori' pue' ngata tumai morumpu hi berewe tomi Simon.
Wori' tauna to napaka'uri' ngkai haki' -ra to wori' nyala. Wori' wo'o seta to mpesuai' tauna napopalai. Aga seta toera, uma-ra napiliu mololita, apa' ra'inca moto Kahi'a-na Ana' Alata'ala.
Kamepulo-na parabaja-pidi, memata-imi Yesus pai' -i malai ngkai ngata hilou hi kawaoa' -na, lou mosampaya.
Simon hante doo-na hilou mpali' -i. Kararua' -na, ra'uli' -ki:
"Wori' tauna mpali' -ko Guru."
Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-tamo hi ngata ntani' -na to mohu' bona mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi ria wo'o-a. Apa' toe-mi patuju-ku tumai hi dunia'."
Ngkai ree, kahilou-nami Yesus hante ana'guru-na mpokeni Lolita Alata'ala hi hawe'ea ngata hi tana' Galilea. Metudui' -i hi rala tomi-tomi posampayaa, pai' -i mpopalai seta to mpesuai' tauna.
Ria hadua tauna to mohaki' poko' rata hi Yesus. Powingkotu' -nami mpopetulungi, na'uli': "Ane ma'ala, paka'uri' -a-kuwo!"
Metumu' -mi ahi' -na Yesus mpohilo-i. Toe pai' najama-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ma'ala moto, kupaka'uri' -moko!"
Hampinisi mata, moronto-mi haki' -na, mo'uri' -imi.
Oti toe, Yesus mpohubui-i hilou, na'uli' -ki: "Kutagi mpu'u-ko,

neo' nulolita hi hema-hema napa to jadi' tohe'i-e. Hilou-moko ulu mpopehuwu woto-nu hi imam, bona nahilo kamo'uri' -numi, pai' keni pepue' -nu ntuku' parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Musa, bona monoa' hi hawe'ea tauna kamo'uri' -nu mpu'u-mi."

Ntaa' we'i, kahilou-na tauna toei, ntora nalolita lau-mi hiapa-apa kanapaka'uri' -na Yesus. Alaa-na, Yesus uma-ipi bisa mesua' hi rala ngata apa' wori' rahi tauna mpotipuhi-i. Mo'oha' hi mali ngata-i-damo hi kawaoa' -na. Aga nau' wae, uma oa' ria kaputua-na tauna tumai ngkai wori' ngata doko' mpohirua' -ki.
Ba hangkuja kahae-na ngkai toe, Yesus nculii' hilou hi ngata Kapernaum. Motolele-mi karia-na Yesus hi rala tomi,
toe pai' wori' tauna himuhu doko' mpohilo-i. Kahimuhu-ra toe, alaa-na bihi' -mi hi rala tomi, rata-rata hi wobo' bihi' tauna. Naparata-raka Lolita Alata'ala.
Bula-na mololita tohe'e, tumai opo' tauna mpokowa' doo-ra to pungku.
Uma ria ohea-ra mpomohui' Yesus apa' bihi' rahi tauna. Toe pai' ngkahe' tuka' -ramo hilou hi lolo tomi, ratangka' ata' to hintoto Yesus, pai' ra'ulu doo-ra ntali ali' -na hilou hi rala tomi.
Nahilo Yesus kabohe pepangala' -ra toe, na'uli' -mi hi topungku toei: "Ana' -ku, te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu."
Ria wo'o-ra-rawo ba hangkuja dua guru agama Yahudi to mohura hi rala tomi toe. Kedi' nono-ra mpo'epe lolita-na Yesus toe, ra'uli' hi rala nono-ra:
"Daho' rahi-i-hana tauna toei mololita hewa tetu! Ha na'uli' -hana hibalia tuwu' -na hante tuwu' -na Alata'ala? Uma ria ntani' -na to ma'ala mpo'ampungi jeko', hadua Alata'ala-wadi."
Ntaa' na'inca moto-di Yesus napa to hi pekiri-rae. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa-di pai' hewa tetu pekiri-nie?

Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria mpu'u kuasa-ku hi dunia' mpo'ampungi jeko'. Tapi' ane ku'uli' -ki topungku toei: `Te'ampungi-mi jeko' -nu,' uma ni'incai ba te'ampungi mpu'u-di jeko' -na ba uma-di. Aga ane ku'uli': `Memata-moko, lulu-mi ali' -nu pai' momako' -moko,' nihilo mpai' kadupa' -na ba ka'uma-na. Jadi', kupopohiloi-koi karia-na kuasa-ku mpo'ampungi jeko'." Ngkai ree, kamewili' -nami hi topungku toei,
na'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko, lulu-mi ali' -nu, pai' -ko nculii' -mi!"

Pemata-na mpu'u-mi topungku toei, nalulu ali' -na, pai' -i momako' hilou rasabii' tauna to wori'. Karahilo-na tauna to wori' napa to jadi' toe, konce omea-ramo, pai' -ra mpo'une' Alata'ala, ra'uli': "Ko'ia ria tahiloi hewa to jadi' tohe'i!"
Oti toe, hilou wo'o-imi Yesus hi wiwi' rano. Wori' lia tauna morumpu, pai' natudui' -ra.
Bula-na momako', mpohilo-i hadua topesingara' paja' to rahanga' Lewi ana' -na Alfeus, bula-na mohura hi kantoro' -na. Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Tuku' -ama!" Kamokore-nami Lewi kaliliu mpotuku' -i.

Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ngkoni' hi tomi Lewi, pai' wori' wo'o-ra topesingara' paja' pai' tau ntani' -na to ra'uli' ntodea dada'a kehi-ra tumai ngkoni' dohe-ra, apa' wori' -ra to mpotuku' Yesus.

Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua guru agama to mpotuku' tudui' Parisi. Kampohilo-ra Yesus ngkoni' dohe tauna to dada'a kehi-ra toe, ra'uli' -mi mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Napa pai' guru-ni ngkoni' hangkaa-ngkania hante topesingara' paja' pai' tauna topojeko' -e!"

Yesus mpo'epe lolita-ra toe, toe pai' napololitai-ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli': "Tauna to uma peda', uma mingki' rapokulii'. Tauna to peda' -wadi-hawo to paraluu rapokulii'. Uma-a tumai mpokio' tauna to monoa' ingku-ra. Katumai-ku toi-le, mpokio' topojeko' -a-kuna bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra."

Rala-na hangkani, topetuku' Yohanes Topeniu' pai' to Parisi bula-ra mopuasa'. Ria-mi tauna rata hi Yesus mpekune' -i: "Topetuku' -na Yohanes Topeniu' mopuasa', wae wo'o topetuku' to Parisi, mopuasa' wo'o-ra. Hiaa' topetuku' -nu Iko, napa pai' uma-ra mopuasa'?"

Yesus mpotompoi' -ra hante lolita rapa' toi, na'uli' -raka: "Ane tauna hi posusaa' poncamokoa, ha mopuasa' -ra-rana bula-ra mpo'ema' topemua'? Uma-hawo. Bula-na ria-pidi topemua' dohe-ra, uma-ra mopuasa'.
Tapi' rata mpai' tempo-na, topemua' ra'ala' ngkai laintongo' -ra. Nto'u toe-damo, pai' lako' mopuasa' -rada."

Oti toe Yesus mpo'uli' lolita rapa' to ronyala-pi, na'uli': "Uma ria haduaa tauna to mpotelepei baju to hae hante pontaia' to bo'u. Apa' pontaia' to bo'u mongkuru' mpai', duu' -na mpoheu' baju to hae toe, alaa-na kaboo-bohea lau-mi heu' -na.

Wae wo'o uma ria tauna to mpotua anggur to bo'u hi rala pontu'ua to hae. Apa' ane dede' -ipi mpai', mopengka lau-mi pontu'ua to hae toe, alaa-na mobowo lau-mi anggur, pai' mpadaa' -mi pontu'ua-na. Jadi', anggur to bo'u kana ra'ihii' hi pontu'ua to bo'u wo'o-hawo."
Hangkani hi eo pepuea', Yesus pai' ana'guru-na ntara rala bonea. Bula-ra mpotara bonea toe, ana'guru-na mpotepo' wua' gandum pai' raru'a.
To Parisi to hi ree mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Napa-di-rana pai' ana'guru-nu mpotiboki atura agama-tae? Mobago-ra-rana hi eo pepuea'."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Ha uma ria nibasa napa to nababehi Magau' Daud owi nto'u Abyatar jadi' Imam Bohe-e? Nto'u-na Daud hante ema' -na mo'oro' pai' uma ria anu rakoni', mesua' -imi hi rala tomi pepuea', pai' -i mpokoni' roti to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala, pai' nabagi wo'o-raka doo-na. Ntuku' ada agama-ta, imam-wadi-hana to ma'ala mpokoni' roti toe. Aga nau' wae, gau' -na Daud toe uma-hawo naposala'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Alata'ala mpobabehi eo pepuea' bona mpotulungi manusia'. Bela manusia' to rababehi bona napari'une' ada eo pepuea'.
Jadi', Aku' Ana' Manusia', ria kuasa-ku mpo'uli' napa to ma'ala rababehi hi eo pepuea'."
Rala-na hangkani, mesua' wo'o-imi Yesus hi rala tomi posampayaa. Hi ree, ria hadua tauna to mate pale-na hamali.
Ria wo'o-ra hi ree to Parisi to tungkai' doko' mpali' kasalaa' Yesus meka' mobago-i hi eo pepuea', apa' doko' rapakilu-i. Jadi', ralelemata-i meka' ba mepaka'uri' mpu'u-i hi eo pepuea'.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali: "Mai-ko mokore hi laintongo' rehe'i."

Oti toe, na'uli' -raka to Parisi: "Ntuku' ada agama-ta, to'uma to ma'ala tababehi hi eo pepuea': mpobabehi to lompe' -di ba to dada'a? Mpotulungi doo ba mpatehi doo?" Tapi' to Parisi toera, oja' -ra mpotompoi' -i, ngkaba'i-ra-wadi.
Mogolili Yesus mponaa-ra. Moroe-i pai' peda' nono-na apa' motu'a rahi nono-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki tauna to mate pale-na hamali toei: "Tanoa pale-nu!" Kanatanoa-nami pale-na, mo'uri' -imi.
Palai-ra to Parisi ngkai tomi posampayaa toe, pai' -ra morumpu hante tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes. Mpali' akala-ra bona Yesus rapatehi.
Yesus hante ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree hilou hi wiwi' rano. Wori' to Galilea ntuku' -i. Wori' wo'o to tumai ngkai tana' Yudea,
ngkai Yerusalem, ngkai tana' Idumea, ngkai dipo ue Yordan, ria wo'o ngkai ngata Tirus pai' Sidon. Wori' rahi tauna to tumai hi Yesus apa' ra'epe hawe'ea to nababehi.

Wori' tauna to mohaki' napaka'uri', alaa-na mome'upi' -ra tauna lou mpomohui' -i doko' mpoganga-i. Ngkai kawori' tauna, toe pai' nahubui ana'guru-na mporodo sakaya nahawi', nee-neo' mpai' ra'upi' -i ntodea.
Rata wo'o-ra tauna to napesuai' anudaa'. Kampohilo-ra Yesus kaliliu mowingkotu' -ra hi nyanyoa-na, pai' -ra mejeu', ra'uli': "Iko-mi Ana' Alata'ala!"
Aga natagi mpu'u-ra, bona neo' ra'uli' kahema-nai.
Oti toe, Yesus manake' hilou hi bulu' -na, pai' -i mpokio' tauna hema-hema to napokono. Rata mpu'u-ramo,
pai' napelihi hampulu' rodua-ra, na'uli' -raka: "Kupelihi-koi bona nipodohe-a, pai' bona kusuro-koi mpopalele Kareba Lompe'.
Pai' kuwai' -koi kuasa mpopalai seta."

Tohe'i-mi hanga' -ra to hampulu' rodua toera: Simon (Yesus mpohanga' -i Petrus); oti toe, Yakobus ana' Zebedeus; pai' Yohanes ompi' -na Yakobus (Yesus mpohanga' -ra Boanerges-- batua-na: tauna to hewa berese); oti toe, Andreas; Filipus; Bartolomeus; Matius; Tomas; Yakobus ana' Alfeus; Tadeus; Simon to Zelot; pai' Yudas Iskariot (hi'a mpai' to mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na).
Oti toe, Yesus nculii' hilou hi tomi. Aga wori' wo'o-wadi tauna to tumai mpotipuhi-i, alaa-na Yesus pai' ana'guru-na uma-ra tepongkoni'.
Toe pai' ria tauna to mpo'uli': "Wuli-imile!" Kara'epe-na ompi' -na Yesus tohe'e, hilou-ramo ke mpo'ala' -i.

Ria wo'o hi ree guru agama Yahudi to lako' rata ngkai Yerusalem. Ra'uli' guru agama toera: "Ah, napesuai' Beelzebul-i-hanale, magau' hawe'ea seta. Magau' seta toe-mile to mpowai' -i kuasa mpopalai seta-e."
Toe pai' Yesus mpokio' -ra bona mpomohui' -i, pai' napololitai-ra hante ba hangkuja nyala lolita rapa', na'uli': "Ha beiwa-hawo seta mpopalai hingka seta-na?
Ane rapa' -na ria hadua magau', pai' ntodea hi rala kamagaua' -na ntora mosisala, uma mpai' ntaha mahae kamagaua' -na toe.
Ane tau hantina ntora motuda', bate pagaa' -gaa' mpai' posantinaa-ra.
Wae wo'o hi kamagaua' seta. Ane hi rala kamagaua' seta ria posisalaa pai' potudaa', kamagaua' -na toe uma ntaha mahae, kahudua-nami mpai' toe.

"Seta ma'ala rarapai' -ki tauna to parimuku. Ane mesua' -ta hi rala tomi tauna to parimuku doko' mpo'ala' ihi' tomi-na, kana tahoo' ncala' -i, pai' lako' ma'ala tapatau' rewa-na. Wae wo'o, ane Aku' mpopalai seta, batua-na, meliu kuasa-ku ngkai seta.
"Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Hawe'ea jeko' manusia' pai' lolita pesapuaka-ra ma'ala ra'ampungi.
Aga hema to mposapuaka Inoha' Tomoroli', uma ria ampungia-ra duu' kahae-hae-na. Pesapuaka-ra toe raposala' duu' kahae-hae-na."
Pai' hewa toe lolita-na Yesus, apa' ria to mpo'uli' kanahawi' -na anudaa' -i, uma rapangalai' kangkai Inoha' Tomoroli' kuasa-na.
Ngkai ree, rata-mi tina-na pai' ompi' -na Yesus mokore hi mali tomi. Mpohubui-ra tauna mpokio' -i tumai hi mali-na bona rapololitai.
Nto'u toe, wori' tauna mpotololiki Yesus. Ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, tina-nu pai' ompi' -nu, oe-ra ria hi mali-na mpali' -ko."
Yesus mponaa tauna to mpotololiki-i, pai' na'uli': "Ane tina-ku pai' ompi' -kule, hira' toe-ramo lau.
Apa' hema-hema to mpobabehi konoa Alata'ala, hira' -mi ompi' -ku pai' hira' -mi tina-ku."

Rala-na hangkani, metudui' wo'o-imi Yesus hi wiwi' rano. Wori' lia tauna morumpu mpotololiki-i. Ngkai kawori' tauna, toe-mi pai' hilou-i mohawi' sakaya to hi lolo ue, mohura-i hi rala-na pai' tauna to wori' mokore hi talinti.
Wori' nyala to natudui' -raka hante lolita rapa'. Hewa tohe'i na'uli' -raka:
"Pe'epei! Ria hadua topohawu' hilou mohawu'.
Rala mpohawu' -na toe, ria hawua' -na to monawu' hi mata ohea. Rata danci mpotilo' hawua' toe duu' -na oti.
Ria wo'o to monawu' hi tana' to watua, hangkedi' -wadi tana' -na. Hinawu' -na toe sohi' lia tuwu', apa' moreni' tana' -na.
Kamorani' -na eo, molaju-imi duu' -na bangi, apa' uma monala rali' -na.
Ria wo'o to monawu' hi laintongo' rui. Tuwu' rui mpo'upi' hinawu' toe, alaa-na uma-i mowua', mate lau-idi.

Ria wo'o hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu'. Tuwu' lompe' hawua' toe kakaa-kamaa, alaa-na mowua'. Ria to nte tolu mpulu' ngkani ngkai hinawu' -na, ria to ono mpulu', ria wo'o to ha'atu ngkani ngkai hinawu' -na."
Ka'oti-na mpololita lolita rapa' toe, na'uli' -miraka: "Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Oti toe, nto'u-na Yesus hadudua-na, ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua pai' topetuku' -na to ntani' -na tumai mpekune' -i: "Napa-die batua-na lolita rapa' toe-e we'i?"

Na'uli' Yesus: "Owi, Alata'ala ko'ia mpopo'incai manusia' beiwa-i mpai' jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Aga hewa toe lau, napopo'incai-mokoi tudui' toe. Tapi' ane tauna to bela topetuku' -ku, kutudui' -ra hante lolita rapa',

bona madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': `Pe'epe moto-ra, aga uma oa' ra'incai batua-na. Pehilo moto-ra, aga hewa to uma oa' monoto rahiloi. Jadi', uma oa' -ra nculii' hi Alata'ala, pai' jeko' -ra uma te'ampungi.'"
Oti toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane uma ni'incai batua lolita rapa' toe we'i, beiwa kani'inca-na batua lolita rapa' to ntani' -na?
Topohawu', hira' -mi tauna to mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala.
Ria tauna to ma'ala rarapai' -ki hawua' to monawu' hi mata ohea. Ra'epe moto Lolita Alata'ala, aga Magau' Anudaa' mpohilingai' nono-ra, alaa-na uma-pi rapoinono lolita toe.
"Ria wo'o tauna to ma'ala rarapai' -ki hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to watua. Kara'epe-na Lolita Alata'ala, ncaliu goe' nono-ra.
Aga uma morali' mpu'u Lolita Alata'ala hi rala nono-ra, toe pai' uma-ra ntaha mahae. Ane rabalinai' -ra ba rapakasusa' sabana pepangala' -ra hi Lolita Alata'ala, kamo'ungkere' -rami.
"Ria wo'o tauna to rarapai' -ki hawua' to monawu' hi olo' rui. Ra'epe moto Lolita Alata'ala,

aga sese' -ra ntora mpenonoi katuwu' -ra hi rala dunia' toi, doko' -ra mporumpu rewa dunia' -wadi, pai' wori' nyala kahinaa hi rala nono-ra. Hawe'ea toe mposesei' -ra, alaa-na uma ria po'ohaa' Lolita Alata'ala hi rala nono-ra, pai' uma ria kalaua-na lolita toe hi katuwu' -ra.

"Ria wo'o tauna to rarapai' -ki hawua' to monawu' hi tana' to morudu'. Mpo'epe-ra Lolita Alata'ala, kaliliu ratarima. Hi tauna toe-ramo Lolita Alata'ala mowua' mpu'u. Ria to mowua' hangkedi', ria to mowua' wori', ria to mowua' wori' lia."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Ha ria-ta to mpokeni palita hi rala tomi pai' tapopoi' hante kura ba tatu'u hi une' poturua? Tantu uma-hawo ria. Palita bate ratu'u hi pontu'ua-na bona nahinii hobo'.
Apa' hawe'ea to tewuni kana rapopehuwu, pai' hawe'ea to kalerua kana jadi' kahiloa.
Hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!"
Na'uli' tena Yesus: "Penotohi mpu'u-koi napa to ni'epe tohe'i-e. Apa' kawoo-woria' Lolita Alata'ala to nibagi-ki doo, kawoo-woria' wo'o to nanotohi-kokoi Alata'ala-- ba melabi tena-pi ngkai ree.
Tauna to mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, ranotohi nono-ra bona kawoo-woria' to ra'inca. Aga tauna to uma dota mpotarima Lolita Alata'ala, nau' ria hangkedi' to ra'inca, ra'alai' lau-ra."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i: Hadua tauna mpotujai' bonea-na.
Hi bengi-na turu-i, hi eo-na memata-i. Kahae-na toe, tinuja' -na tuwu' kaboo-bohea. Aga beiwa tinuja' -na tuwu' pai' jadi' bohe, uma-hawo na'incai.
Ngkai tana' moto-hawo pehupaa' wua' -na. Lomo' -na rau-na pai' kaho-na to mehupa', ngkai ree huwu-mi, duu' -na mo'ihi.
Kataha' -na pae, hilou-imi pue' -na ngkeni are' nasoe-ki, apa' tempo-nami mepae."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Ane Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia', beiwa kajadi' -na? Kajadi' -nale hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i:
Ria tauna to mpohawu' unto' hawi hi tana'.

Unto' toe monete' lia, meliu kakedi' -na ngkai hawe'ea unto' to ria hi dunia'. Aga ane rahawu' -i-damo pai' -i tuwu', meliu kabohe-na ngkai ngkojo to ntani' -na. Ra'a-na mopanga molanga, duu' -na rapopetai danci pai' rapengkamoui."
Wae-mi Yesus mpoparata Lolita Alata'ala hi ntodea hante wori' nyala lolita rapa', ntuku' pakulea' -ra mpopaha.
Uma ria to natudui' -raka ane uma hante lolita rapa'. Aga ane Hi'a-damo pai' ana'guru-na, nanotohi-miraka omea.
Ncimonou' toe wo'o, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hilou-tamo hi dipo rano."
Jadi', apa' hi rala sakaya ami' -imi Yesus, pe'ongko' -rami mpalahii ntodea to hi wiwi' rano. Ria wo'o sakaya ntani' -na hi ree to mpotuku' -ra.
Ko'ia mahae, rata-mi ngolu' bohe. Ntepu'u-mi balumpa mporumpa' sakaya-ra, alaa-na neo' ponu' -mi sakaya-ra hante ue.
Yesus leta' moto-i molunai hi wuntu sakaya. Kahilou-rami ana'guru-na mpolike-i, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru! Napa-di pai' nupelele' moto-ta neo' matala-tamoe?"
Pemata-nami Yesus pai' -i mpotagi ngolu' pai' balumpa, na'uli': "Mento'o-ko ngolu'! Rodo-moko balumpa!" Mento'o mpu'u-mi-hawo ngolu', pai' muu-mule' molino nculii' -mi rano.
Na'uli' -mi Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' me'eka' rahi-koie? Ha uma ria pepangala' -nie?"
Me'eka' lia-ramo ana'guru-na, pai' momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema mpu'u-idi-hana tau toii-e? Ngolu' pai' rano molino-di-hana ntuku' hawa' -na!"
Ngkai ree, rata-ramo hi dipo rano, hi tana' Gerasa.

Hi tana' Gerasa toe, ria hadua tauna to nahawi' anudaa'. Hi daeo' -wadi po'ohaa' -na. Uma-i tono rahoo' nau' hante rante, apa' uma mowo karoho-na. Pontu-na witi' -na pai' pale-na rahoo', aga koloro pai' rante ma'ala oa' nadupe'. Ngkai kamoroho-na toe, pai' uma ria haduaa to daho' mpodongo-i. Hi eo-na hi bengi-na ntora dao' -dao' -na hi daeo' pai' hi bulu' -na, pai' kakakio' -kio', pai' -i mposerohi woto-na hante watu. Jadi', wae pana'u-na Yesus ngkai rala sakaya, mehupa' -mi tauna to kahawia' toei ngkai daeo'.
Kampohilo-na Yesus ngkai molaa, pokeno-nami hilou mperapai-i, pai' -i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na mponyompa-i.

Yesus mpohubui anudaa' malai, na'uli': "Malai-moko ngkai tauna tetui!" Mejeu' tau toei na'uli': "Ee Yesus Ana' Alata'ala to hi suruga! Napa-di-kona pai' tumai-koe? Hante hanga' Alata'ala merapi' -a bona neo' -a-kuwo nusesa'."
Yesus mpekune' -i: "Hema hanga' -nu?" Na'uli': "Hanga' -ku Legion, apa' wori' -kai hampo'emaa' to mesua' hi tau toii." (Hanga' Legion tohe'e, batua-na: moncobu.)
Rajojo seta toera merapi' hi Yesus bona neo' -ra napopalai ngkai ngata toe.
Uma molaa ngkai ree, ria wori' wawu mojume hi panapa bulu'.
Anudaa' toera merapi' hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Hubui-kai mesua' hi wawu toera mai."

Napiliu moto-ra Yesus. Ngkai ree, malai mpu'u-ramo anudaa' toera kaliliu mesua' hi wawu. Pesua' -ra hi wawu toe, mparampuli-ramo-rawo wawu hilou mengkajuala' hi rano, mate bonga-ramo hi rala ue-- kawori' -ra ria nte roncobu ma'a.
Karahilo-na tauna to mpodoo wawu toera napa to jadi', pokeno-rami hilou hi rala ngata pai' hi bonea to mohu' mpoparata kajadia' toe. Toe pai' tumai-ramo pue' ngata doko' mpohilo napa to jadi'.
Karata-ra hi Yesus, rahilo-rawo tauna to kahawia' toei, mohura rodo-imi, moheai-i, pai' monoto-mi nono-na. Mpohilo toe, me'eka' -ramo.
Tauna to mpohilo kajadia' toe mpotutura napa to jadi' hi tauna to kahawia', pai' napa to jadi' hi wawu-ra.
Ngkai ree, pue' ngata merapi' hi Yesus bona malai-i ngkai ngata-ra. Jadi', mohawi' nculii' -imi hi rala sakaya.
Bula-na Yesus mohawi' toe, tauna to kahawia' -e ngone merapi' bona ma'ala-i hilou dohe-na.
Tapi' uma-i napiliu, na'uli' -ki: "Nculii' -moko hilou hi tomi-nu, uli' -raka hingka ngata-nu napa to nababehi Pue' Ala hi iko, pai' ahi' -na hi iko."
Hilou-imi-hawo hi tana' Dekapolis (batua-na: Hampulu' Ngata), mpopalele napa to nababehi Yesus hi woto-na. Konce hawe'ea tauna to mpo'epe.
Nculii' wo'o-imi Yesus hilou hi dipo rano. Karata-na hi dipo-na, wori' wo'o-mi tauna mpotipuhi-i. Bula-na hi wiwi' rano-pidi,
rata hadua pangkeni tomi posampayaa to Yahudi, hanga' -na Yairus. Kampohilo-na Yesus, powingkotu' -nami hi nyanyoa-na
mpopetulungi, na'uli': "Neo' mate lia-imi dei' -ku hi tomi. Lou-ta hi tomi-ku, nujama-ka-kuwo bona mo'uri' -i, bona neo' -i-hawo mate."
Hilou mpu'u-imi Yesus dohe-na, pai' mo'iko wo'o tauna ntuku' -ra. Wori' tauna mpo'upi' Yesus.
Hi olo' ntodea, ria hadua tobine, hampulu' rompae-imi moraa', uma ria kantotoa' -na.
Mompae-mpae-imi mpopepokulii' hi dokter, duu' -na oti-mi ihi' tomi-na napobalu' bona ria napobayari-raka. Aga uma oa' ria kamo'uria' -na, tedonihii lau-di haki' -na.

Wori' -mi to na'epe to mpotompo'wiwi Yesus. Toe pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na: "Nau' baju-na-wadi kureo, mo'uri' -ale mpai'!" Jadi' mengkahipi' -imi-hawo hilou hi olo' tauna to wori' mpomohui' Yesus ngkai tilingkuria-na, pai' naganga mpu'u-mi-hawo baju-na.
Wae kanaganga-na, hampinisi mata mentoda' -mi poraa' -na. Ncaliu na'inca kamo'uri' -nami.
Nto'u toe wo'o-hawo, Yesus mpo'inca karia-na baraka' malai ngkai Hi'a. Kame'ili' -nami hi tauna to wori', na'uli': "Hema to mpoganga baju-kue?"
Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Guru, nuhilo moto-kowole kawori' tauna to mpo'upi' -koe. Beiwa-kona pai' nupekune' hema to mpoganga-ko?"
Aga Yesus menaa ntololikia-na mpali' tauna to mpoganga-i.
Na'inca tobine toei napa to jadi' hi woto-na. Kamoridi' -nami-hawo me'eka', pai' tumai-i mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa Yesus mpangaku' hawe'ea-na.
Yesus mpo'uli' -ki tobine toei: "Ana' -ku, mo'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'. Nculii' -moko hante kalompea' tuwu' -nu. Mo'uri' -moko, uma-pi ria haki' -nu."
Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata-mi ba hangkuja dua suro ngkai tomi Yairus mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Mate-imi-hana ana' -nu. Neo' -pi mposusai' Guru."
Pe'epe moto-i Yesus napa to ra'uli' suro toera. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yairus: "Neo' mere' nono-nu! Pangala' moto-mi-hana!"
Kakaliliu-nami Yesus mako', aga uma napiliu tauna to wori' mpodohei-i mesua' hi rala tomi Yairus, muntu' Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes ompi' -na Yakobus-wadi.
Karata-na hi tomi Yairus, na'epe-hawo merodo' -ra-damo tauna, hangaa pogeo' -ra-damo pai' motantangi' rahuduwukui.
Kamesua' -na hi rala tomi, na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' merodo' rahi-koi geo' -e! Uma-i-hawo-le mate-e. Leta' -i-wadi."
Mpo'epe toe we'i, rapotawai-i-wadi. Ngkai ree, Yesus mpohubui-ra omea malai ngkai rala tomi, pai' -i mesua' hi kamar poturua ana' toei, hante tina pai' tuama-na, pai' ana'guru-na to tolu.
Nakamu pale-na ana' toei, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Memata-moko ana'!" Hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi, moni-na hewa toi: "Talita kum!"
Pemata-nami ana' toei kaliliu momako'. (Umuru-na hampulu' rompae.) Uma mowo kakonce-ra tauna to mpohilo.
Aga Yesus mpotagi-ra, na'uli': "Neo' mpu'u nilolita napa to lako' jadi' toi." Pai' na'uli' wo'o: "Wai' -imi ana' tetui koni' -na."
Oti toe, Yesus me'ongko' ngkai ngata toe hilou hi ngata-na moto hante ana'guru-na.

Hi eo pepuea', hilou-i hi tomi posampayaa mpotudui' tauna. Wori' tauna hi ree. Kampo'epe-ra tudui' Yesus, konce-ra ra'uli': "Hema-di to mpotudui' -i hawe'ea toe-e? Kapantea napa-di to ria hi Hi'a-e? Beiwa pai' ma'ala-i mpobabehi anu mekoncehi?
Bo topowangu tomi-i-wadi, ana' Maria. Ompi' -na, hira' Yakobus, Yoses, Yudas pai' Simon. Ompi' -na tobine, ria moto wo'o-ra dohe-ta hi rehe'i." Toe pai' oja' -ra mepangala' hi Yesus.
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Hadua nabi bate rabila' hiapa kahilouaa-na. Aga hi ngata-na pai' tomi-na, pai' dohe ompi' -na moto, uma lau-i rabila'."
Jadi', Yesus mpokehele-ra apa' uma-ra mepangala'. Toe pai' uma-i bisa mpobabehi wori' anu mekoncehi hi ria. Sampale to nababehi, mpojama ba hangkuja dua topeda' bona mo'uri' -ra.
Mpokio' -i ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, nasuro-ra rodua-rodua hampo'emaa', pai' nawai' -ra kuasa mpopalai anudaa'.
Kako'ia-ra me'ongko', natudui' -ra hewa toi: "Neo' -koi ngkeni napa-napa hi pomakoa' -ni, muntu' lua' -wadi. Neo' ngkeni pongkoni' ba boku ba doi hi rala karepe'.
Ma'ala moto-koi mpake' lihi witi', aga neo' ngkeni rontonga' baju."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi: "Ane rata-koi hi hameha' ngata pai' ratarima-koi hi tomi hantomi, mo'oha' hi ree-mokoi duu' -ni kaliliu hilou mpai' hi ngata ntani' -na.
Ane ria pue' ngata to uma dota mpotarima-koi, ane oja' -ra mpo'epe lolita to nikeni, wae kanipalahii-na ngata-ra, tonta awu to mentaka' hi palanta' witi' -ni, tanda kanahuku' -ra mpai' Alata'ala."
Ka'oti-na Yesus mpotudui' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua toera, me'ongko' -ramo hilou mpotudui' tauna bona medea-ra ngkai jeko' -ra.
Wori' seta to rapopalai. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to peda' ragelai' hante lana pai' rapaka'uri'.

Nto'u toe, Magau' Herodes Antipas mpo'epe kareba napa to nababehi Yesus, apa' hanga' Yesus rapotompo'wiwi hiapa-apa. Ria to mpo'uli': "Yesus toei lou, Yohanes Topeniu' -ile tuwu' nculii'! Toe-hana pai' ria baraka' -na mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi toe-e."
Aga ria wo'o to mpo'uli': "Yesus toei, nabi Elia to owi-i." Hiaa' ria wo'o to mpo'uli': "Nabi mpu'u-i, hewa nabi to owi."
Kana'epe-na Magau' Herodes tohe'e, na'uli' -mi: "Yohanes Topeniu' mpu'u-i-tano Yesus toei lou-e! Kupehubui wengi rapata' wuroko' -na, aga tuwu' nculii' -imi."

Hewa toi tutura kamate-na Yohanes Topeniu'. Magau' Herodes mpo'ago pai' mpotobine Herodias, tobine ompi' -na moto to rahanga' Filipus. Wori' ngkani Yohanes mpokamaro Herodes ngkai gau' -na toe, na'uli' -ki: "Uma-ko ma'ala mpotobine era-nu tetui! Gau' -nu tetu mpotiboki Atura Musa." Ngkai ree, Herodes mpohubui tantara-na hilou mpohoko' Yohanes. Rahoko' mpu'u-imi, rahoo' pai' -i ratarungku'.
Ane Herodias-e, mowuku-damo nono-na hi Yohanes, doko' napatehi. Aga uma-i mologa mpopadupa' roe-na toe,

apa' Herodes mpohubui tantara-na mpojaga-i hi rala tarungku'. Me'eka' -i mpatehi Yohanes apa' na'inca, tauna to monoa' -i pai' moroli' wo'o-i. Ane Herodes mpo'epe Yohanes mpololitai-i, mokarara' nono-na, aga goe' wo'o-i mpo'epe-i mololita.

Hi eo pompokiwoia kaputua Magau' Herodes, ria-mi loga-na Herodias. Hi eo toe, Magau' Herodes mpobabehi posusa' mpokiwoi eo kaputua-na. Mpokio' -i wori' maradika, tadulako pai' pangkeni to ngkai tana' Galilea.

Bula posusa' toe, ana' -na Herodias tobine mesua' pai' modero'. Goe' lia-i Magau' Herodes mpohilo podero' toronaa toei, wae wo'o torata-na. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki toronaa toei: "Ane ria ba napa to nupokono, perapi' -mi, bate kuwai' -ko."
Mosumpa wo'o-i, na'uli': "Nau' ba napa mpu'u-mi to nuperapi', nau' hantanga' ngkai poparenta-ku, bate kuwai' -ko!"
Palai-nami toronaa toei hilou mpekune' tina-na, na'uli': "Ina', napa to kuperapi' -e?" Na'uli' tina-na: "Perapi' -mi woo' -na Yohanes Topeniu'!"
Kanculii' -nami hilou hi Magau', kaliliu na'uli': "Merapi' -a woo' -na Yohanes Topeniu' wae lau, ratu'u hi lolo dula."
Mpo'epe pomperapia' toe-di, soho' lia-mi nono-na Magau'. Aga uma-pi ma'ala nadii' nculii' lolita-na hi toronaa toe, apa' mpolia' mosumpa-imi we'i ra'epe torata-na.
Kaliliu napahawa' hadua tantara-na hilou mpo'ala' woo' Yohanes Topeniu'. Kahilou-nami-hawo tantara toe hi tarungku' mpopata' wuroko' -na.
Woo' -na toe nakeni tumai natu'u hi lolo dula pai' natonu-ki toronaa toei, pai' toronaa toei mpowai' tina-na.
Kara'epe-na topetuku' -na Yohanes kamate-nami, hilou-ramo-rawo mpo'ala' woto-na, pai' ratana.
Suro to nahubui Yesus mpopalele Lolita Alata'ala wengi, nculii' -ramo ngkai pomakoa' -ra, pai' ratutura-miki Yesus hawe'ea to rababehi pai' to ratudui' -raka ntodea.

Nto'u toe, wori' lia tauna to hilou-tumai, alaa-na ntahawe' ngkoni' neo' uma-pi ria loga-ra. Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus hi topetuku' -na: "Kita hilou hi kawaoa' -na mpalahii tauna to wori', bona ma'ala-ta mento'o hampai'."
Jadi', mohawi' sakaya-ramo hilou hi kawaoa' -na.

Ntaa' pehilo moto-di-hana tauna pe'ongko' -rae, pai' ra'inca wo'o toaa' -ra. Jadi', wori' tauna ngkai hawe'ea ngata to mohu', pokeno-rami hilou hi wiwi' rano, rata meri'ulu lau-ra ngkai Yesus hante ana'guru-na.
Pehompo-na Yesus ngkai sakaya, nahilo-hawo wori' tauna mpopea-i. Metumu' -mi ahi' -na mpohilo-ra, apa' hiloa-ra hewa bima to uma te'ewu. Kanatudui' -rami wori' nyala.
Neo' solo-mi eo, tumai-ramo ana'guru-na mpomohui' -i, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, wao' -hana hi rehe'i lau, pai' neo' limpa-mi eo.
Agina tahubui-ramo tauna toera lau hilou hi ngata pai' tomi hi bonea to mohu' bona mpo'oli pongkoni' -ra."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -mi to mpopokoni' -ra." Hampetompoi' ana'guru-na: "Ei'! Ha napa-mi-kaina to kiwai' -rakae? Nau' ro'atu doi pera' kipope'oli-ki roti, uma-le hono' mpopokoni' tauna to hewa toe lau kadea-ra."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Kamata pe', hangkuja meha' roti to ria hi koi' -e." Ka'oti-na rapehiloi, ra'uli': "Ria-le, lima meha' -wadi, pai' rongkaju bau' uru."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpohubui tauna to wori' mohura omea mopantuda-ntuda hi kowo', apa' wori' kowo' to mata' nto'u toe.
Pohura-rami pantuda-ntuda, butu ntuda-na ria nte ha'atu, ria wo'o to nte lima mpulu'.

Oti toe, na'ala' -mi roti to lima meha' pai' uru to rongkaju, pai' -i ngkongoa' hi langi' mosampaya. Oti toe, napihe-pihe-mi roti, pai' nawai' -raka ana'guru-na bona rabagi hi ntodea. Pai' uru to rongkaju, nabagi wo'o-raka omea.
Ngkoni' omea-ramo duu' -ra bohu.
Ka'oti-ra ngkoni', rarumpu-mi toro-na roti pai' bau', hampulu' roluncu-pi.
Kawori' -ra to ngkoni' roti toe, ba ria nte lima ncobu paka' tomane.
Oti toe Yesus mpohubui ana'guru-na mosakaya meri'ulu hilou hi dipo rano hi ngata Betsaida, pai' -i mpohubui tauna to wori' nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra.
Ponculi' -ra ntodea, manake' -imi hilou hi bulu' -na lou mosampaya.
Mobengi-mi, hi laintongo' rano-ramo ana'guru-na. Hiaa' Hi'a, hi role-nai-pidi hadudua-na.
Nahilo-hawo kawuhe-ramo mowose, apa' ngolu' mewui mpotomu sakaya-ra. Parabaja-mi, momako' -imi hilou hi lolo ue mpototoaka-ra, ntani' naliu-ra.
Karahilo-na to momako' hi lolo ue, pe'au-rami me'eka', ra'uli': "Etu tope'ekahi!"
Wilingkoroa omea-ramo mpohilo-i. Ncaliu na'uli' -raka Yesus: "Pakaroho nono-ni! Neo' me'eka'! Aku' -mile toi-e."
Kangkahe' -nami hi rala sakaya dohe-ra, ngolu' wo'o haliu ora-mi. Uma mowo kakonce-ra, apa' kuyu-ramo.
Apa' nau' ko'ia-ra mahae mpohilo tanda mekoncehi to nababehi hante roti-e ngone, ko'ia oa' monoto hi rala nono-ra kahema-na mpu'u-i Yesus. Morara' oa' -pidi nono-ra mepangala'.
Karata-ra hi dipo rano, mencore-ramo hi tana' to rahanga' Genesaret.
Pehompo-ra ngkai sakaya, rahilo-rawo pue' ngata Kayesus-na to rata hi ngata-ra.
Pokeno-rami hilou hi ngata-ngata to mohu', pai' -ra tumai mpokowa' doo-ra to peda'. Hiapa-apa kara'epea-na ria-i, hi ree wo'o-mi tauna mpokeni doo-ra topeda'.

Hiapa kahiloua-na Yesus hi rala ngata bohe ba ngata kedi', rakeni tumai doo-ra topeda' pai' rapopoturu hi wiwi' karajaa, pai' -ra merapi' hi Yesus bona napiliu-ra mporeo nau' kampa' wuntu baju-na-wadi. Hawe'ea to mporeo baju-na, haliu mo'uri' -ramo.
Hangkani ria-ra to Parisi pai' guru agama Yahudi to ngkai Yerusalem mpohirua' -ki Yesus.
Mpohilo-ra ba hangkuja dua topetuku' Yesus ngkoni' hante uma-ra mowano ncala' ntuku' ada agama Yahudi.
Apa' hawe'ea to Yahudi, mo'ipi lia-ra mpotuku' ada totu'a-ra, hangkedia' -nami hira' to mpotuku' tudui' -ra to Parisi. Ko'ia-ra ngkoni' ane ko'ia-ra mowano ntuku' ada.

Ane nculii' -ra ngkai pomako' -ra hi rala ngata, kana moniu' -ra ulu ntuku' ada kako'ia-ra mpoganga pongkoni'. Pai' wori' wo'o-pi ada to ratarima ngkai totu'a-ra to ratuku' lia, hewa rapa' -na ada mpobohoi' sangkiri', kura pai' rewa to rababehi ngkai ngkala.
Toe pai' to Parisi nte guru-guru agama toera we'i mpokamaro Yesus, ra'uli': "Napa pai' ana'guru-nu, uma-ra mpotuku' ada totu'a-tae? Ngkoni' -ra, uma-ra mowano ncala'."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Koi' -le, hi mali-na-wadi petuku' -ni hi Alata'ala! Makono mpu'u lolita to na'uki' nabi Yesaya owi to mpolowa-koi, hewa toi moni-na: Na'uli' Alata'ala: `Tauna tohe'era mpobila' -a hi wiwi-ra-wadi, nono-ra molaa ngkai Aku'.
Uma ria kalaua-ra mpopue' -a, apa' tudui' -ra tudui' manusia' -wadi, bela tudui' ngkai Aku'.'
Jadi', hawa' Alata'ala nikalempei' moto, hiaa' moroho lia-damo pongkakamu-ni ada manusia'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' tena-raka Yesus: "Koi' -le, pante lia-koi mpelelii' hawa' Alata'ala bona mpotuku' ada-ni moto.
Hi rala Atura Musa te'uki' hewa toi: `Kana tabila' tuama pai' tina-ta.' Pai' `hema to mpotipo' tuama-na ba tina-na kana rapatehi.'

Hiaa' koi' metudui' hewa toi: uma-pi mingki' tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta, asala ta'uli' -raka hewa toi: `Napa to masipato' kuwai' -kokoi totu'a, oti-mi kupajadi' pepue' hi Alata'ala.' Tauna to mpo'uli' hewa toe, nibahaka-imi ngkai kinolo-na mpotulungi tina pai' tuama-na.
Jadi', Lolita Alata'ala uma nisaile', ada to nitarima ngkai totu'a-ni, tetu lau-mi to nitudui' -raka ntodea. Wori' -pidi to hewa tohe'i to nibabehi."
Oti toe Yesus mpokio' wo'o-mi tauna to wori' bona mpomohui' -i, na'uli' -raka: "Epe omea-koi bona ni'inca:
Nau' ba napa-napa to takoni', uma-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala. Kehi to mehupa' ngkai rala nono-ta, toe-die to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e. ((
Jadi', hema-koi to tilingaa, pe'epei lompe'!))"
Oti toe, Yesus mpalahii tauna to wori', pai' -i mesua' hi rala tomi. Ana'guru-na mpekune' -i ba napa patuju tudui' -na toe we'i.
Na'uli' mpo'uli' -raka: "Ha uma wo'o-koiwo nipaha-e? Pongkoni' to mesua' hi rala nganga-ta ngkai mali-na, bela-hawo toe to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala.
Apa' pongkoni' toe, uma mesua' hi rala nono-ta. Mesua' hi ta'i-ta-wadi, pai' ngkai ree kaliliu tatadi." Hante lolita-na toe, Yesus mpakanoto ka'uma-na ria pongkoni' to rapalii'.
Na'uli' tena-raka: "Aga kehi pai' gau' -ta, toe-dile to mpakada'a-ta hi poncilo Alata'ala-e, apa' kehi pai' gau' -ta toe mehupa' ngkai nono-ta.
Ngkai nono manusia' mehupa' pekiri to dada'a, pai' alaa-na ria to mogau' sala' hi tobine ba hi tomane, manako, mepatehi,
mobualo', mebagiu, metipo', pai' mpobabehi wori' nyala to dada'a. Mpokahina anu doo, mohingi', molangko nono, nakeni hina nono to dada'a, uma tuduia'.
Hawe'ea gau' dada'a to hewa toe-mi lau mehupa' ngkai nono manusia'. Toe-mi to mpakada'a tauna hi poncilo Alata'ala-e."
Ngkai ree, hilou-imi Yesus hi tana' to mohu' hi ngata Tirus, pai' -i mesua' hi rala tomi. Patuju-na bona ke neo' ra'incai tauna karata-na. Aga karata-na uma ma'ala wuniia'.

Hi ngata toe, ria wo'o hadua totina, ana' -na tobine kahawia'. Kana'epe-na totina toei karia-na Yesus hi ngata, katumai-nami mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na mpopetulungi, na'uli': "Popalai-ka-kuwo seta to mpohawi' ana' -ku!" Hiaa' tobine toei, bela-i to Yahudi, to Fenisia-i-hana ngkai tana' Siria.
Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Aku', mpotulungi to Yahudi-a-kuna ulu. Uma lompe' mpo'ala' koni' ana', pai' rarora-ki dike'."
Na'uli' -mi-hawo tobine toei: "Makono moto-di Pue'. Aga dike' to hi une' meja' wo'o-hawo-le, biasa-ra ngkoni' koni' ana' to mohewu' ngkai lolo meja'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' -mi Yesus: "Kono wo'o-kowo petompoi' -nu! Wae-pi, nculii' -moko, malai-mi seta to mpesuai' ana' -nu."
Kanculii' -nami totina toei. Rata hi tomi, nahilo ana' -na rodo-imi hi poturua-na, apa' malai mpu'u-mi seta.
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpalahii ngata Tirus mpokaliliu pomako' -na ntara hi ngata Sidon, pai' nculii' wo'o-imi hilou hi rano Galilea, rata hi tana' Dekapolis.
Hi ree, ria to mpokeni hadua tauna to wongo pai' to neo' uma howa' mololita. Merapi' -ra bona najama-i-hawo.
Yesus mpokeni tauna toei ngkai laintongo' ntodea. Ka'oti-na napatani' -i, nape'uso karawe-na hi tilinga-na ntimalia, mpetiliku-i, pai' -i mpojama jila' -na tauna toei.
Oti toe, ngkongoa' -imi hi langi' mpo'osu' inoha' -na pai' mpo'uli': "Mobea-mi!" (Hi rala basa-ra to Yahudi, moni-na hewa toi: "Efata!")
Pe'epe mpu'u-imi-hawo, pai' jila' -na molengkue' -mi. Lonto' -mi-hawo pololita-na.
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpotagi-ra tauna to wori' bona neo' ra'uli' hi hema-hema napa to jadi' tohe'e. Aga nau' wae kanatagi-ra, hangkedi' -na lau-mi karatolele-na.
Uma mowo kakonce-ra ntodea, ntora ra'uli' -mi: "Hawe'ea to nababehi, lompe'. Tauna to wongo napaka'uri', pe'epe-ramo! Tauna to uma howa' mololita, howa' -ramo mololita!"
Uma mahae ngkai ree, wori' wo'o-mi tauna morumpu dohe Yesus. Apa' uma-hawo ria pongkoni' -ra, nakio' -ra ana'guru-na pai' na'uli' -raka:
"Tuna-kuna nono-ku mpohilo tauna to wori' toera lau. Tolu eo-ramo dohe-ku, uma ria pongkoni' -ra.
Hiaa' ane kuhubui-ra nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra ntali oro' -ra, meka' molinga' -ra mpai' hi ohea. Apa' ria-ra to ngkai kalaa-na."
Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Ngkaiapa-tana mpai' tarata pongkoni' tapokoni' -raka, bo wao' -hana hi rehe'i lau?"
Napekune' -ra: "Hangkuja roti to ria hi koi' -e?" Ra'uli' -ki: "Pitu meha'."

Ngkai ree, nahubui-ramo tauna to wori' mohura hi tana'. Na'ala' -mi roti pai' -i mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe, napihe-pihe-mi pai' nawai' -raka ana'guru-na mpobagi-bagi-raka tauna to wori'.
Ria wo'o-raka bau' uru to kedi' ba hangkuja ma'a. Naposampayai wo'o pai' nahubui ana'guru-na mpobagi hi ntodea.
Ngkoni' -ramo duu' -ra bohu. Kawori' -ra to ngkoni' nto'u toe, ba opo' ncobu. Ka'oti-ra ngkoni', rarumpu-mi toro-na, pitu luncu-pi. Oti toe, Yesus mpohubui-ra nculii' hilou hi tomi-ra,
pai' Hi'a hante ana'guru-na mohawi' sakaya hilou hi ngata Dalmanuta.
Ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata hi Yesus, pai' ratepu'u-mi mpomehono' -ki doko' mposori-i. Ra'uli' -ki: "Babehi-mi anu mekoncehi bona monoto ki'inca kangkai Alata'ala-na mpu'u-ko."

Kana'epe-na Yesus lolita-ra, na'osu' -mi inoha' -na pai' na'uli': "Napa-di pai' tauna to tuwu' tempo toi merapi' tanda mekoncehi-e? Uma-a dota! Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: uma-koi kupopohiloi tanda mekoncehi hewa to niperapi'."
Kanapalahii-rami, mehawi' -imi hi sakaya hilou hi dipo rano.
Hi pomako' -ra tohe'e, ana'guru-na Yesus uma mpokiwoi ngkeni boku, muntu' hameha' roti to ria hi rala sakaya.
Yesus mpololitai-ra hante hanyala walatu, na'uli': "Pelompehi-koi, mo'inga' -inga' hi ragi-ra to Parisi pai' ragi Magau' Herodes!"
Aga uma ra'incai batua-na walatu toe, helee momepololitai moto-ramo, ra'uli': "Pai' na'uli' hewa toe-le, apa' uma ria roti-ta."

Ntaa' na'inca-di Yesus napa to ra'uli' ana'guru-nae, toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' ntora mpololita ka'uma-na ria roti-nie? Ko'ia oa' -tano nipaha-e? Ha uma oa' monoto nono-ni, jau-mi ni'epe tudui' -ku, jau nihilo kabaraka' -ku? Mataa pai' tilingaa moto-koi, hiaa' uma oa' nipaha napa to nihilo pai' to ni'epe? Ha uma nikiwoi,
roti to lima meha' kupihe-pihe kupokoni' -raka tauna to lima ncobu? Hangkuja luncu-pi toro-na to nirumpu?" Ra'uli' ana'guru-na: "Hampulu' roluncu."
Napekune' tena Yesus: "Pai' roti to pitu meha' kupokoni' -raka to opo' ncobu, hangkuja luncu wo'o-pi toro-na to nirumpu?" Ra'uli': "Pitu luncu-pi."
Na'uli' tena-raka: "Hiaa' uma oa' nipaha toe?"
Ngkai ree, rata-ramo hi ngata Betsaida. Hi ngata toe, ria to ngkeni hadua towero hi Yesus. Merapi' -ra bona najama-i-hawo.
Yesus mpokamu pale-na, pai' natete' -i hilou hi mali bola'. Na'uelikui mata-na pai' naganga. Oti toe, napekune' -i: "Ria to nuhilo ba napa-napa?"
Towero toe menaa-naa pai' na'uli': "Kuhilo tauna, mokao' hewa kaju to mako' hilou tumai."
Oti toe, naganga tena mata-na, pai' nahubui-i menaa. Mo'uri' mpu'u-miki mata-na. Hawe'ea to nahilo, monoto-mi.
Oti toe, Yesus mpohubui-i nculii' hilou hi tomi-na, na'uli' -ki: "Nculii' -moko hilou hi tomi-nu, aga neo' -ko mesua' hi rala ngata mpo'uli' -raka pue' ngata napa to jadi' toi."
Yesus hante ana'guru-na hilou hi ngata to mohu' Kaisarea Filipi. Hi lengko ohea, napekune' -ra, na'uli': "Ntuku' ponguli' ntodea, hema-a Aku' toi-e?"
Ra'uli' -ki: "Ria to mpo'uli' Yohanes Topeniu' -ko tuwu' nculii'. Ria wo'o to mpo'uli' nabi Elia-ko. Ria wo'o-ra to mpo'uli' Iko hadua nabi to owi tuwu' nculii'."
Napekune' tena-ra, na'uli': "Hiaa' koi' -koiwo mpo'uli' hema-a Aku' toi-e?" Natompoi' Petrus: "Iko-mi Magau' Topetolo'!"
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' ulu ni'uli' hi hema-hema ka'Aku' -na Magau' Topetolo'."

Oti toe, natepu'u-mi Yesus mpotudui' ana'guru-na napa to kana jadi' hi woto-na. Na'uli' -raka: "Aku' Ana' Manusia' kana mporata wori' kaparia. Rasapuaka-a mpai' totu'a ngata, imam pangkeni hante guru agama. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga tolu eo oti toe, tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Hawe'ea toe napolonto' mpo'uli' -raka. Aga Petrus mpo'ai' -i hi ncori-na pai' nakorai' -i.
Yesus me'ili' pai' mponaa ana'guru-na, pai' -i ngkaroe Petrus, na'uli' -ki: "Palai-ko topesori! Pekiri-nu tetu-le pekiri manusia', bela pekiri Alata'ala."

Oti toe, Yesus mpokio' tauna to wori' bona morumpu hangkaa-ngkania hante Hi'a pai' ana'guru-na. Na'uli' -raka: "Hema to doko' mpotuku' -a kana mpobahaka konoa-na moto, pai' kana napaha'a kaju parika' -na-- batua-na: kana natuku' hawa' -ku nau' napomate-ki. Oti toe-di pai' lako' ma'ala-i mpotuku' -a.

Hema to mpentaei konoa-na moto, uma-i mpai' mporatai katuwua' to lompe'. Aga hema to mpobahaka konoa-na moto sabana petuku' -na hi Aku' pai' sabana Kareba Lompe', nau' napomate-ki, hi'a mpai' to mporata katuwua' to lompe'.
Napa kalaua-na tarumpu hawe'ea ka'uaa' dunia', ane uma taratai katuwua' to lompe' hi eo mpeno-na.
Apa' uma ria napa-napa to ma'ala tasula' -ki katuwua' to lompe' toe.

"Mo'oha' -koi hi laintongo' tauna to dada'a pai' to uma mpotuku' -a. Aga hema to me'ea' mpangaku' petuku' -na hi Aku' pai' mpoka'ea' tudui' -ku, Aku' wo'o mpai' me'ea' mpangaku' kahi'a-na topetuku' -ku ane rata-apa mpai' ngkai suruga. Nto'u toe mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' mana'u tumai hante mala'eka-mala'eka to moroli', mehini-a hante baraka' -na Tuama-ku."
Na'uli' wo'o-mi Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Ngkai olo' -ni koi' toi, ria-koi mpai' to ko'ia mate kako'ia-na nihilo Alata'ala moparenta hante baraka' -na."

Ono mengi ngkai ree, Yesus mpobawai tolu ana'guru-na hilou dohe-na hi bulu' to molangko. Ana'guru to tolu toera: Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes. Muntu' Yesus hante ana'guru-na to tolu toera-wadi to hi ria. Bula-ra hi ria, mobali' -mi lence-na.
Pohea-na hangaa mengea' meringkila', uma ria haduaa hi rala dunia' tohe'i to ma'ala mo'uja' duu' -na mengea' hewa toe.
Rahilo-rawo ana'guru-nae, ria rodua nabi to owi mpololitai Yesus. Nabi toera, Elia pai' Musa.
Ngkai ree Petrus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru, lompe' lia-ta mo'oha' hi rehe'i. Agina kibabehi-damo tolu bamaru': hameha' bagia-nu Pue', hameha' bagia-na Musa, pai' hameha' wo'o bagia-na Elia."
Kakono-na, uma-hawo na'incai Petrus napa to na'uli' toe, apa' nto'u toe bula-ra me'eka' lia.
Nto'u toe wo'o, rata-mi limu' mpokamoui-ra, pai' ngkai rala limu' ra'epe topololita to mpo'uli': "Hi'a toi-mi Ana' -ku to kupe'ahi'. Pe'epei lolita-na!"
Hampegoli we'i, ranaa-rawo ntololikia-ra, uma-pi ria tau ntani' -na dohe-ra, hadua Yesus-damo.
Pana'u-ra ngkai lolo bulu' toe, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Neo' ulu nilolita hi hema-hema napa to nihilo we'i, duu' -na Aku' Ana' Manusia' memata ngkai kamatea."

Ratuku' mpu'u-miki hawa' -na toe, uma mpu'u-rawo ralolita kajadia' toe hi hema-hema. Aga hi himpau hira' moto bate ntora rapomepekunei' ba napa patuju-na Yesus mpo'uli' kamemata-na mpai' ngkai kamatea.
Mepekune' -ramo hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' nabi Elia ncala' -di to ri'ulu rata, pai' lako' rata-idi Magau' Topetolo' -e?"

Na'uli' -raka: "Makono mpu'u-di. Elia kana rata mperi'ulu, apa' hi'a to mporodo hawe'ea-na. Aga beiwa-ama Aku' Ana' Manusia'? Napa pai' hi rala Buku Tomoroli' te'uki' kamporata-ku wori' kaparia pai' -a raruge' tauna?
Aga ane nabi Elia, ku'uli' -kokoi, mpolia' rata-imile Elia-e, aga pangkeni ngata-ta mpo'ewa-i ntuku' konoa-ra, hewa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'."

Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na to tolu toera, mana'u-ramo ngkai lolo bulu' mpohirua' -raka ana'guru to ntani' -na. Rata hi ria, rahilo-rawo wori' tauna mpotipuhi ana'guru-na, pai' ba hangkuja dua guru agama bula-ra mpomehono' -raka.
Pehilo-ra tauna to wori' toera etu-mi tumai Yesus. Wae kampohilo-ra, konce-ramo. Pokeno-rami hilou mpohirua' -ki.
Yesus mpekune' -ra: "Napa to nipomepekunei' hante guru agama toera?"
Hadua ngkai tauna to wori' toera mpo'uli': "Guru, oi-kuwo ana' -ku, kukeni bona nupaka'uri' -i. Uma-i howa' mololita apa' napesuai' anudaa' -i.
Ane napesuai' wo'o-ipi anudaa' -e, modungka-i hi tana', mowura' nganga-na, kakakeji' -keji' ngihi' -na, pai' mokadu hudu woto-na. Kuperapi' -ramo ana'guru-nu mpopalai anudaa' -na, aga uma rakulei'."

Na'uli' Yesus: "Uma mowo-koie'. Ko'ia oa' -tano mepangala' -koie! Ni'uli' -koina hangkuja tena-pi kahae-ku dohe-ni, hangkuja tena-pi kahae-na kupengkatarii kalente pepangala' -nie! Keni tumai ana' tetui!"
Rakeni mpu'u-mi ana' toei hi Yesus. Wae pehilo-na anudaa' toei mpohilo Yesus, napakako'o wo'o-mi woto ana' toei duu' -na modungka-i pai' -i ngkawulela' hi tana', nganga-na mowura'.
Mepekune' -i Yesus hi tuama-na ana' toei, na'uli': "Hangkuja-mi hae-na narata haki' toi-e?" Na'uli' tuama-na: "Ngkai kakedia' -nami-hana.
Wori' ngkani-mi anudaa' mpodungka-i hi rala apu ba hi rala ue doko' napatehi. Ane ma'ala Guru, poka'ahi' pai' tulungi-ka-kaiwo!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' `ane ma'ala-e?' Hawe'ea ma'ala jadi' hi tauna to mepangala'."
Hampetompoi' tuama-na ana' toei napesukui: "Mepangala' -ama Pue'! Tulungi-a-kuwo, apa' aku' toi kura' rahi pepangala' -ku."

Nahilo Yesus kawoo-woria' tauna to mokeno tumai morumpu. Kanahawai' -nami anudaa' toe, na'uli': "Ee anudaa' to mepakawongo pai' mepakawojo tetu-ko! Petibo' -ko ngkai ana' tetui, pai' neo' -pi nupesuai' nculii'."
Pe'au-nami ana' toei, kakapadi-padi woto-na, pai' malai-mi anudaa'. Kamalai-na anudaa', uma-pi molengo ana' toei, hewa tomate-imi, alaa-na wori' to mpo'uli': "Mate-imi!"
Aga Yesus mpokamu pale-na mpotulungi-i memata. Memata mpu'u-imi-hawo ana' toei.
Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree mesua' hi rala tomi. Pesua' -ra hi rala tomi, mepekune' -ramo hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Guru, napa pai' uma kipakulei' mpopalai anudaa' toei-e we'i?"
Na'uli' -raka: "Anudaa' to hewa tohe'e uma-hana ma'ala rapopalai hante inca napa-napa, muntu' hante mosampaya."
Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na malai ngkai ree mpokaliliu pomako' -ra ntara hi tana' Galilea. Patuju-na Yesus bona neo' ra'incai ntodea kahiapa-na,
apa' nto'u toe bula-na mpotudui' ana'guru-na. Na'uli' -raka: "Aku' Ana' Manusia', ratonu-a mpai' hi kuasa manusia'. Rapatehi-a mpai', aga tolu eo oti toe, tuwu' nculii' -a."
Aga ana'guru-na uma mpo'incai patuju-na Yesus. Hiaa' uma wo'o-ra daho' mpekune' -i.
Rata-ramo hi ngata Kapernaum. Hi rala tomi-ramo, mepekune' -i Yesus hi ana'guru-na, na'uli': "Napa-die to ntora nilolita hi lengko ohea-e we'i?"
Uma-ra winihi, apa' to rapomehonoi' hi lengko ohea we'i, ba hema-ra to meliu kabohe tuwu' -ra.

Jadi', mohura-imi Yesus pai' -i mpokio' ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, na'uli' -raka: "Hema to doko' meliu bohe tuwu' -na, kana tuwu' mengkadingki' -i, meliu kadingki' -na ngkai hawe'ea doo-na, pai' kana jadi' pahawaa' hi hawe'ea doo-na."
Oti toe, na'ala' hadua ana' to kedi', napopokore hi laintongo' -ra. Nakupui ana' toei pai' na'uli' -raka ana'guru-na:

"Hema to mpotarima hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii sabana petuku' -na hi Aku', batua-na Aku' -mi to natarima. Pai' hema to mpotarima-a, uma muntu' Aku' to natarima, mpotarima wo'o-i Alata'ala to mposuro-a."
Na'uli' Yohanes mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, ria kihilo hadua tauna mpopalai seta hante hanga' -nu, aga kitagi-i apa' bela-i topetuku' -ta."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Neo' -i ratagi, apa' tauna to mpobabehi anu mobaraka' hante hanga' -ku, uma-ra mpai' kaliliu mporuge' -a.
Tauna to uma mpo'ewa-ta, batua-na hira' -mi to tono' hi kita'.

"Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ane ria to mpotulungi-koi apa' topetuku' Kristus-koi, bate mporata-i hiwili-na hi eo mpeno. Nau' ue mara-wadi nawai' -koi ni'inu sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku', bate mporata-i mpai' hiwili-na.

"Aga hema to mpopanawu' hadua ana' to kedi' hewa ana' toii alaa-na uma-ipi mepangala' hi Aku', bohe mpu'u mpai' pehuku' -na Alata'ala hi tauna tetui. Agina lau-pi hameha' watu po'ahaa' to bohe ratoe hi wuroko' -na pai' -i ratene' hi rala tahi'.

"Ane rapa' -na pale-ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko', pua' lau-imi. Agina hamali-damo pale-ta, asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala. Agina lau-pi toe, ngkai palea ntimalia-ta, hiaa' ka'omea-na mesua' naraka-tamo hi rala apu to jela' ncuu. ((
Apa' hi ria mpai', tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu.))

Ane rapa' -na witi' -ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko', pua' lau-imi. Agina hamali-damo witi' -ta, asala mporata-ta katuwua' to lompe' dohe Alata'ala. Agina lau-pi toe, ngkai witia' ntimalia-ta, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala naraka. ((
Hi ria mpai', tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu.))

Pai' ane rapa' -na mata-ta hamali mpakeni-ta mojeko', jungki' lau-mi. Agina hamali-wadi mata-ta pai' -ta jadi' ntodea Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na. Agina lau-pi toe, ngkai mataa ntimalia-ta, hiaa' ka'omea-na ratadi-ta hi rala apu naraka.
Hi ria mpai', tauna nakoni' ule ncuu pai' rasesa' hi rala apu.
Ntuku' Atura Musa, hawe'ea pongkoni' to rapopepue' hi Alata'ala kana rapoii'. Wae wo'o butu dua tauna kana rapomoroli' hante apu.

"Poi' wori' kalaua-na. Aga ane mobali' -mi kapoi' -na alaa-na mononto, napa tena to ma'ala mpakapoi' -i? Wae wo'o, koi' to mpotuku' -a kana hewa poi': Neo' nipelele' pepangala' -ni jadi' lente. Kana tuwu' hintuwu' -koi."
Malai-imi Yesus ngkai ree hilou hi tana' Yudea pai' hi dipo ue Yordan. Wori' wo'o-mi tauna tumai mpotipuhi-i, pai' hewa to lalaua natudui' wo'o-ramo.
Ria ba hangkuja dua to Parisi rata mpali' kedo'. Rapekune' -i: "Ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-hawo tomane mpogaa' -ki tobine-nae?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa parenta to nawai' -kokoi nabi Musa?"
Ratompoi' to Parisi: "Musa mpiliu tomane mpogaa' -ki tobine-na, asala nababehi ncala' sura mpogaa'."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Musa mpo'uki' pai' mpoparata-kokoi parenta toe-le, apa' ngkai kamotu'a maga-ni, uma tuduia'.
Aga ngkai lomo' kajadi' dunia', nto'u Alata'ala mpajadi' manusia', napajadi' -ra hadua tomane pai' hadua tobine.
`Toe pai' tomane kana mpalahii tina pai' tuama-na, pai' kana tuwu' hintuwu' hante tobine-na,
bona hira' tau rodua toe jadi' hewa hadua lau-ra-damo.' Jadi', hi poncilo Alata'ala, tau hancamoko uma-pi rodua, hadua lau-ramo.
Toe pai' ku'uli' -kokoi: ane ntoa' Alata'ala mpoposidai' -ra, manusia' uma ma'ala mpogaa' -ra."
Oti toe, Yesus pai' ana'guru-na mesua' hi rala tomi. Bula-ra hi rala tomi ana'guru-na mpekune' -i, ra'uli': "Beiwa mpu'u-hawo gau' pogaa' tohe'e we'i-e?"
Na'uli' -raka: "Hema to mpogaa' -ki tobine-na pai' -i ncamoko hante tobine to ntani' -na, mobualo' -i-hana, mpobualohi tobine-na to lomo' -na.
Wae wo'o tobine to mpogaa' -ki tomane-na pai' -i ncamoko hante tomane to ntani' -na, mobualo' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo."
Hangkani, ria tauna to mpokeni ana' -ra hi Yesus bona najama pai' nagane' -ra. Aga ana'guru-na mpokaroe tauna toera.

Mpohilo toe-di, kamoroe-nami Yesus mpokaroe ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Pelele' moto-ra ana' tetura tumai hi Aku', neo' -ra nitagi. Apa' tauna to hewa toe-ramo to jadi' ntodea-na Alata'ala hi rala Kamagaua' -na.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Ane uma-koi mengkoru hi Alata'ala hewa ana', uma-koi mpai' jadi' ntodea-na hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Ka'oti-na mpo'uli' toe, nakupui-ramo ana' toera, najama-ra pai' -ra nagane'.

Neo' me'ongko' wo'o-imi Yesus mpokaliliu pomako' -na, muu-mule' mokeno tumai hadua tauna mperapai-i, kaliliu mowingkotu' hi nyanyoa-na, pai' -i mepekune', na'uli': "Guru to lompe', napa-kuwo to kana kubabehi bona mporata-a-kuwo katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa pai' nu'uli' tauna to lompe' -a? Uma ria ntani' -na to lompe', hadua Alata'ala-wadi.
Nu'inca moto parenta to te'uki' hi rala Atura Pue': `Neo' mepatehi, neo' mobualo', neo' manako, neo' mosabi' boa', neo' mebagiu, pai' kana tabila' tina pai' tuama-ta.'"
Na'uli' tauna toei: "Guru, hawe'ea parenta tetu lau, kutuku' omea-mi ngkai kakedia' -ku."

Yesus mpomonaa-i hante ahi' -na, pai' na'uli' -ki: "Hanyala-pi to kana nubabehi. Lou-moko ulu mpobalu' rewa-nu, pai' doi oli-na wai' -raka tokabu. Ane nubabehi hewa toe, bohe mpai' rasi' to nurata hi rala suruga. Oti toe, pai' tumai-moko mpotuku' -a."
Kana'epe-na lolita-na Yesus tohe'e, peda' -mi nono-na. Kamalai-nami ngkai ree hante susa' nono-na, apa' wori' rewa-na.
Yesus mpomonaa ana'guru-na to mokore ntololikia-na, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Mokoro rahi tauna to wori' rewa-ra mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Rapokakonce ana'guru-na mpo'epe lolita-na tohe'e. Toe pai' na'uli' tena-raka: "Ana' -ana' -ku, mokoro mpu'u manusia' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra.
Mojoli-pi hama'a unta ntara hi wulou' jaru, ngkai tauna to mo'ua' mengkoru hi Alata'ala bona Hi'a jadi' Magau' -ra."
Mpo'epe toe-di, hangkedi' kakonce-ra ana'guru-na, ra'uli': "Ei', ane wae-di, hema lau-damo to ma'ala mporata katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-nae!"
Yesus mponaa-ra pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ane hante pakulea' manusia' -le, uma ami' hema. Aga ane Alata'ala, ma'ala oa' madupa', apa' hi Alata'ala uma ria to uma madupa'."
Ngkai ree, na'uli' Petrus mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Hiaa' kai', kipalahii omea-mi-kaina bona mpotuku' -ko."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Hema-hema to mpalahii ompi' -na, tina-na ba tuama-na, ana' -na ba tomi-na ba bonea-na sabana mpotuku' -a pai' sabana Kareba Lompe',

bate mporata-i mpai' hiwili to bohe. Hi dunia' toi mporata-i ha'atu ngkani kawori' tomi, ompi', tina, ana', bonea-- pai' mporata wo'o-i pebalinai'. Pai' hi eo mpeno-na mpai', mporata wo'o-i katuwua' to lompe' duu' kahae-hae-na.
Aga wori' tauna to bohe tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' kedi' tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno. Pai' wori' wo'o tauna to kedi' tuwu' -ra tempo toi jadi' bohe tuwu' -ra hi eo mpeno."

Yesus hante ana'guru-na mpokaliliu pomako' -ra hilou hi Yerusalem. Yesus momako' ri'ulu, ana'guru-na hi boko'. Koro' ana'guru-na mpohilo-i, pai' tauna to metuku' hi boko' wo'o me'eka' omea-ramo. Toe pai' nakio' wo'o-mi ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua mopahantani', pai' na'uli' -raka napa to kana jadi' mpai' hi woto-na.

Na'uli': "Epe-koi! Hilou-tamo tohe'i-e mpotoa' Yerusalem. Hi ria mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia' ratonu hi imam pangkeni pai' guru agama, pai' rabotuhi bona rapatehi-a. Oti toe ratonu-a hi tauna to bela-ra to Yahudi.
Rapopo'ore' -a, ra'uelikui, raweba', pai' rapatehi. Aga tolu eo oti toe tuwu' nculii' moto-a."
Oti toe, Yakobus pai' Yohanes, ana' -na Zebedeus, mpomohui' Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, ria hanyala to doko' kiperapi' ngkai Iko."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Napa to niperapi' kuwai' -koi?"
Ra'uli': "Ane nupopehuwu mpai' baraka' -nu pai' -ko jadi' Magau', piliu-kai mohura pai' moparenta dohe-nu, hadua hi mali ka'ana-nu, hadua hi mali ki'ii-nu."
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Uma ni'incai napa to niperapi' tetu. Ha nipakule' mpai' mpokolo kaparia to kana kukolo Aku' -e? Ha nipakule' mpotodohaka to kutodohaka-e mpai'?"
Ra'uli': "Kipakule' moto!" Na'uli' Yesus: "Makono, bate nikolo mpu'u mpai' kaparia hewa to kukolo, pai' nitodohaka napa to kutodohaka.
Aga ane hema to mohura hi mali ka'ana-ku ba hi mali ki'ii-ku, bela Aku' to mpakatantu tetu. Alata'ala-hana to mpakatantu hema to mporata bagia tetu."
Kara'epe-na ana'guru-na to hampulu' pomperapia' Yakobus pai' Yohanes toe, moroe-ramo.

Toe pai' Yesus mpokio' -ra omea, pai' na'uli' -raka: "Ni'inca moto kasoa-ra topoparenta to uma mpo'incai Alata'ala mpoparentai ntodea-ra. Tauna to bohe pangka' -ra mpewuku ntodea-ra mpotuku' hawa' -ra.
Aga koi', neo' hewa toe kehi-ni! Hema-koi to doko' bohe pangka' -na kana jadi' pahawaa'.
Pai' hema to doko' bohe hanga' -na kana jadi' batua hi hawe'ea doo-na.
Bangku' Aku' Ana' Manusia' -e', patuju-ku tumai hi dunia', uma bona jadi' topohawa'. Pai' -a tumai-le, bona jadi' pahawaa', duu' -na mpewai' woto-ku rapatehi mpotolo' sala' tauna to wori'."

Yesus pai' ana'guru-na rata hi ngata Yerikho. Nto'u-ra malai ngkai ngata, wori' tauna mpotuku' -ra. Hi wiwi' ohea mohura hadua tauna to wero kakarapi' -rapi'. Hanga' -na Bartimeus (batua-na: ana' Timeus).
Kana'epe-na Bartimeus Kayesus to Nazaret to liu, kamekio' -nami na'uli': "Yesus, muli Magau' Daud! Poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Wori' tauna mpokaroe-i, ra'uli': "Ngkalino-ko!" Aga hangkedi' kanapesukui-na mekio': "Muli Magau' Daud, poka'ahi' -a-kuwo!"
Mentoda' -imi Yesus pai' na'uli': "Kio' -i tumai!" Karakio' -nami towero toei, ra'uli' -ki: "Pakaroho nono-nu! Mokore-moko, apa' nakio' -moko!"
Kamokore-nami towero toei, nabahaka abe' -na hi ohea pai' napesahui hilou hi Yesus.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Napa to nupokono kubabehi-koko?" Natompoi' towero toei: "Guru, bona pehilo-a-kuwo!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Hilou-moko. Kupaka'uri' -moko sabana pepangala' -nu hi Aku'." Ncaliu pehilo-imi, pai' -i mpotuku' Yesus.
Kamohu' -ra hi ngata Yerusalem, rata-ramo hi ngata Betfage pai' Betania hi Bulu' Zaitun. Hi ree, Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na hilou meri'ulu,
na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi ngata to tanyanyohi toe mai. Wae pesua' -ni mpai' rala ngata, nihilo mpai' hama'a ana' keledai tehoo', to ko'ia hangkania rahawi'. Bongka koloro-na pai' keni-i tumai.
Ane ria to mpekune' -koi napa pai' nibongka-i, uli' -raka hewa toi: `Apa' naparaluu Pue', napebolo ulu pai' napoponculi' moto mpai'.'"
Kahilou-rami ana'guru-na to rodua toera, rarata mpu'u-mi hama'a ana' keledai tehoo' hi wiwi' ohea mohu' wobo' tomi. Karabongka-nami-rawo.
Tauna to mokore hi ree mpekune' -ra: "Napa pai' nibongka keledai tetu-e?"
Ratompoi' hewa to na'uli' -raka Yesus we'i. Mpo'epe toe, rapelele' wae-ramo mpokeni keledai toe.
Karata-ra nculii', ralampii-mi keledai toe hante baju-ra, pai' mehawi' -imi Yesus.

Hilou-ramo mpotoa' Yerusalem. Wori' tauna mpotuku' -ra. Ria-ra to meri'ulu, ria wo'o-ra to hi boko'. Wori' -ra mpokodo pohea-ra hi mata ohea to natara Yesus, pai' hantongo' wo'o-ra hilou mpo'ala' rau-rau kaju hi pampa pai' rakodo hi mata ohea, bona mpobila' -i. Tauna to wori' toera, ntora mogora-ra mpo'uli': Une' -imi Pue' Ala!" Pue' mpogane' Magau' to tumai mpokeni hanga' -na!"
"Pue' mpogane' poparenta-na. Moparenta-i mpai' hewa ntu'a-ta owi, Magau' Daud." Une' -imi Pue' Ala to hi rala suruga!"

Karata-na Yesus hi ngata Yerusalem, kaliliu mesua' -i hi rala Tomi Alata'ala. Napomonaa ntololikia-na mponaa omea. Oti toe, apa' neo' mobengi-mi, nculii' wo'o-imi hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua hilou turu hi ngata Betania.
Kamepulo-na, me'ongko' wo'o-ramo ngkai Betania lou hi Yerusalem. Hi ohea, mo'oro' -i Yesus.
Molaa-pidi, nahilo-hawo hangkaju kaju ara to mobumu-damo rau-na-- hiaa' ko'ia tempo powuaa' -na. Hilou-imi hi kaju toe, pai' nanaa meka' ba ria wua' -na. Aga uma ria nau' hantakua.
Toe pai' natotowi kaju toe, na'uli': "Ngkai eo toe lau, uma-pi ria mpai' haduaa tauna to mpokoni' wua' ngkai kaju toi!" Ana'guru-na mpo'epe lolita-na toe.

Rata wo'o-ramo hi Yerusalem, hilou-imi Yesus hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala. Hi ree-i mpopalai tauna to mobabalu'. Nabilingko-raka meja' -meja' posulaa' -ra doi, pai' nabilingko wo'o pohuraa topobabalu' danci mangkebodo.
Uma napiliu tauna mpokeni rewa ntara berewe Tomi Alata'ala toe.

Natudui' -ra, na'uli': "Ha uma ni'incai napa to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'? Alata'ala mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Tomi-ku mpai' jadi' tomi posampayaa to rapake' tauna humalili' dunia'.' Hiaa' koi' -koina, niponcawa tomi toperampaki-di!"
Kara'epe-na imam pangkeni pai' guru agama napa to nababehi Yesus toe, rapali' -mi akala-ra doko' mpopatehi-i. Koro' -ra, apa' hawe'ea tauna goe' mpo'epe tudui' -na.
Neo' mobengi-mi, Yesus hante ana'guru-na malai ngkai ngata, lou turu hi Bulu' Zaitun.
Kamepulo-na mepupulo ngkii-pidi, hilou wo'o-ramo hi Yerusalem. Hi lengko ohea, rahilo-rawo kaju ara to natotowi Yesus wengi, mate-mi, bangi rata hi rali' -na.
Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus. Toe pai' na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Yesus: "Guru! Hilo-dile kaju ara to nutotowi wengi-e, molaju-mi!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mepangala' -mokoi hi Alata'ala!

Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: Ane rapa' -na ria tauna to mpo'uli' -ki bulu' tohe'i: `Te'ongko' -moko, mengkanawu' hi rala tahi'!' bate majadi', asala neo' morara' nono-na pai' mepangala' mpu'u-i napa to na'uli' bate madupa'.
Jadi', pe'epei lolita-ku toi: Ane mosampaya-koi mperapi' napa-napa, pangala' -mi-hana kanawai' -nimi Alata'ala napa to niperapi', pai' bate nitarima.
"Pai' ane mosampaya-koi, ane ria to nipodaa' -ki doo-ni, ampungi-i ulu, bona Tuama-ni to hi suruga wo'o mpo'ampungi sala' -ni. ((
Aga ane uma-di ni'ampungi doo-ni, wae wo'o Tuama-ni to hi suruga uma mpo'ampungi sala' -ni.))"
Rata wo'o-ramo Yesus pai' ana'guru-na hi Yerusalem. Nto'u-ra momako' -mako' hi berewe Tomi Alata'ala, rata-ra imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' pangkeni to Yahudi to ntani' -na.
Mepekune' -ra hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Uli' -kakai, ngkaiapa huraa-nu mpobabehi hawe'ea tetu hi Tomi Alata'ala! Hema to mpowai' -ko kuasa hewa tetu-e?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' wo'o, ria pompekunea' -ku hi koi'. Tompoi' -ka ulu, pai' lako' ku'uli' wo'o-kuwo kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi hawe'ea toe lau.
Ngkaiapa kuasa-na Yohanes Topeniu' mponiu' tauna? Ngkai Alata'ala-di, ba ngkai manusia' -di?"
Momepololitai-ramo pangkeni to Yahudi toera, ra'uli': "Beiwa-tale' mpotompoi' -ie? Ane ta'uli' ngkai Alata'ala kuasa-na, na'uli' -taka mpai': `Ane wae, napa pai' uma-i nipangala'?'

Hiaa' mokoro wo'o ane ta'uli' ngkai manusia' -wadi kuasa-na." Pangkeni to Yahudi toera me'eka' mporuge' Yohanes Topeniu', apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea, apa' hawe'ea ntodea mpo'uli' Yohanes toe hadua nabi mpu'u.
Jadi', ratompoi' -i: "Uma ki'incai." Toe pai' na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Ane wae, uma wo'o-kuwo ku'uli' -kokoi kangkaiapa kuasa-ku mpobabehi toe lau."

Oti toe Yesus mpololitai pangkeni to Yahudi toera hante lolita rapa', na'uli': "Ria hadua tauna to mpohu'ai bonea-na hante anggur. Nawala ntololikia-na, nakae tana' mpobabehi torobo' pompeaa' anggur, pai' natunya' pongko pompodooa. Oti toe, napewai' bonea-na rapobago hi ba hangkuja dua tauna, pai' hilou-imi hi ngata to molaa.
Rata-mi tempo pohopua' wua' anggur, napahawa' hadua batua-na hilou mperapi' bagia-na hi to mpodoo bonea-na toera.
Tapi' to mpodoo bonea toera mpohoko' batua-na, rapao' pai' rapopalai mara.
Oti toe, pue' bonea mpahawa' tena hadua batua-na. Rata ria, rapao' wo'o-i-wadi-hawo, weho woo' -na, ralibui' ntarurua' pai' -i rapopalai.
Ngkai ree, nahubui tena hadua batua-na. Rata ria, rapatehi lau-imi. Bate hewa toe-mi kehi-ra hi butu dua batua to napahawa': ria to raweba', ria to rapatehi.
"Uma-pi hema to napahawa' pue' bonea toei, metoro hadua ana' woto-na to nape'ahi' -damo. Ka'omea-na napahawa' ana' -na toe hilou hi to mpodoo bonea-na, na'uli': `Bate rapengkorui-ile mpai'.'
"Ntaa' we'i, to mpodoo bonea toera, mohawa' -ramo ra'uli': `Etu-mi tumai ana' -na, hi'a mpai' to jadi' pue' bonea toi-e. Kita tapatehi-i, bona bonea-na toi kita' -mi pue' -na.'
Karahoko' -nami ana' toei, rapatehi pai' ratadi hi mali bonea."
Ngkai ree, Yesus mpo'uli' -raka pangkeni to Yahudi: "Jadi', napa-mi to nababehi pue' bonea toei? Bate tumai-ile mpopatehi-ra to mpodoo bonea-na, pai' bonea-na nawai' -raka tau ntani' -na.
Tantu nibasa-mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpolowa pesapuaka-ni hi Aku', hewa toi moni-na: `Watu to ratadi topowangu tomi, watu toe lau-mi to jadi' poko parawatu.
Tohe'e majadi' ntuku' konoa Pue' Ala, uma mowo kalompe' -na hi poncilo-ta.'"

Kara'epe-na pangkeni to Yahudi lolita-na Yesus tohe'e, doko' rahoko' -i apa' ra'inca kahira' -na to natoa' hante lolita rapa' toe. Aga uma-ra daho' mpohoko' -i, apa' mpoka'eka' -ra ntodea. Jadi', malai-ramo mpalahii-i.
Ngkai ree, pangkeni to Yahudi mpohubui ba hangkuja dua to Parisi pai' tauna to tono' hi Magau' Herodes hilou hi Yesus. Patuju-ra doko' mpahala'nawu' -i hante pompekunea' -ra.

Karata-ra hi Yesus, ra'uli' -ki: "Guru, ki'inca Guru tau monoa'. Metudui' -ko hante kalonto' -lonto' -na mpo'uli' napa konoa Alata'ala hi manusia'. Uma nupengkorui ba hema-hema, apa' uma-ko mpelence tauna. Toe pai' kipekune' -ko: ntuku' atura agama-ta, ba ma'ala moto-ta mpobayari paja' hi Kaisar, ba uma-di? Kana tabayari, ba uma mingki' tabayari?"
Na'inca Yesus patuju nono-ra to tewunii'. Toe pai' na'uli' -raka: "Napa pai' nipali' kahala'kedoa' pololita-kue? Keni pe' tumai doi to biasa nibayari-ki paja', doko' kuhilo."
Ngkai ree, ratonu-miki hampepa' doi pera'. Na'uli': "Lence hema pai' hanga' hema to hi doi toi?" Ra'uli': "Lence pai' hanga' Kaisar."
Na'uli': "Ane wae-di, wai' -ki Kaisar napa to masipato' rawai' -ki Kaisar. Pai' wai' -ki Alata'ala napa to masipato' rawai' -ki Alata'ala." Konce-ramo mpo'epe tompoi' -na toe.
Oti toe, ba hangkuja dua to Saduki rata hi Yesus. To Saduki toera, pangkeni agama Yahudi to mposapuaka tauna to mate tuwu' nculii' hi eo mpeno. Karata to Saduki toera, ra'uli' -ki Yesus:
"Guru, nabi Musa mpo'uki' hi rala buku atura hewa toi: ane hadua tomane mate hiaa' uma-ki ria ana' -na, pudupuhe-na kana mpotobine balu-na bona ria-ki-hawo muli-na.
Jadi', ria pitu to ntali ompi' paka' tomane. To ulumua' motobinei, mate-i uma ria ana' -na.
Tu'ai-na mpotobine balu-na. Mate wo'o-i-wadi-hawo, hiaa' ko'ia-i mo'anai'. Wae wo'o to majadi' hi katolu-na,
duu' rata hi kapitu-na. Mate omea-ramo hante uma ria ana' -ra. Ka'omea-na, mate wo'o-imi-hawo tobine toei.
Jadi', hi eo mpeno, ane tuwu' nculii' mpu'u-di hawe'ea tomate-e, hema-ramo mpai' pue' tobine toei, apa' pitu-ramo to mpotobine-i."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Sala' mpu'u pekiri-ni tetu-e, apa' uma nipaha ihi' Buku Tomoroli', uma wo'o ni'incai baraka' -na Alata'ala.
Apa' ane tuwu' nculii' -ramo tauna to mate, katuwu' -ra hewa katuwu' mala'eka hi rala suruga, uma-rapa motobinei ba motomanei.

Ha ko'ia ria nibasa lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpakanoto katuwu' -ra nculii' tomate-e? Hi rala buku Atura Musa, tabasa tutura-na beiwa Alata'ala mpololitai nabi Musa ngkai rala julumpu to jela'. Nto'u toe, Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub mahae-ramo mate. Aga nau' wae, Alata'ala mpo'uli' -ki Musa hewa toi: `Aku' toi-mi Alata'ala to napue' Abraham, Alata'ala to napue' Ishak, Alata'ala to napue' Yakub.'

Jadi', ngkai lolita-na Alata'ala toe, monoto-mi ta'inca katuwu' -ra moto Abraham, Ishak pai' Yakub. Apa' bela tauna to mate to mepue' hi Alata'ala, tauna to tuwu' -hana to mpopue' -i. Sala' rahi-koina pekiri-ni tetu-e."

Nto'u toe, hadua guru agama Yahudi rata hi Yesus. Na'epe pomehono' -ra to Saduki hante Yesus we'i, pai' na'uli' hi rala nono-na: "Lompe' mpu'u tompoi' -na Yesus tetui!" Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-imi-hawo hi Yesus, na'uli': "Parenta to'uma to poko-na ngkai hawe'ea parenta?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Toi-mi parenta to poko-na: `Pe'epei-koi to Israel! Pue' -ta Pue' Alata'ala hadua-na-wadi.
Kana tapoka'ahi' -i hante nono-ta mpu'u, tatonu hawe'ea katuwu' -ta hi Hi'a, tapoka'ahi' -i hudu inca-ta pai' hudu pakulea' -ta.'
Pai' tohe'i-mi parenta karonyala-na: `Kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa pompoka'ahi' -ta woto-ta moto.' Uma ria parenta ntani' -na to meliu kabohe-na ngkai to ronyala tohe'i."
Na'uli' -mi guru agama toei hi Yesus: "Makono mpu'u-di Guru! Makono lia to nu'uli' tetu-e. Pue' Ala bate hadua-na-wadi, uma ria ntani' -na.

Pai' kana tapoka'ahi' -i hante nono-ta mpu'u, hante hawe'ea pekiri-ta pai' hudu pakulea' -ta. Pai' kana tapoka'ahi' doo-ta hewa woto-ta moto. Toe to meliu kalompe' -na ngkai hawe'ea porewua pai' rewa ntani' -na to tapopepue' hi Alata'ala."
Na'epe Yesus kamonoto tompoi' -na tauna toei. Toe pai' na'uli' -ki: "Neo' jadi' ntodea hi rala Kamagaua' Alata'ala mpu'u-moko!" Ngkai ree, uma-pi hema to daho' mpekune' ba napa-napa hi Yesus.
Nto'u-na Yesus metudui' hi Tomi Alata'ala, na'uli': "Napa pai' guru agama mpo'uli' Magau' Topetolo' muli-na Magau' Daud?

Hiaa' bo Daud moto mpokahangai' -i Pue' -na. Hante petete' Inoha' Tomoroli' Daud mpotompo'wiwi Magau' Topetolo' hewa toi: Pue' Ala mpo'uli' -ki Pue' -ku: `Mohura-moko hi mali ngka'ana-ku duu' -na kupopengkoru hawe'ea bali' -nu hi Iko.'

Nto'u-na Yesus mpotudui' ntodea, na'uli' -raka: "Pelompehi-koi, neo' -koi mpenau' kehi-ra guru agama. Goe' -ra modao' mpopake' baju to moloe, pai' goe' -ra ane tauna hi wiwi' karajaa motingkua' mpotabe-ra.
Goe' -ra rapopohura hi pohuraa karabilaa' hi tomi posampayaa. Goe' -ra ane rapopohura-ra hi pohuraa to lompe' hi posusaa'.
Mpobagiu-ra tobine tobalu, pai' -ra mpohagoi tomi-ra. Rawunii' kadada'a gau' -ra tohe'e hante mosampaya rapomoloe-loe. Motomo lia mpai' huku' -ra."
Yesus mohura mohu' peti' pompunaa' doi pepue', pai' -i mponaa tauna to mpopuna' doi pepue' -ra hi rala-na. Wori' tauna to mo'ua' mpopuna' doi uma hangke-ngkedi'.
Nto'u toe, rata wo'o-hawo hadua tobine tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na, napuna' wo'o-hawo doi pepue' -na. To napuna' tohe'e, rompepa' doi ngkala, hangkedi' lia oli-na.
Yesus mpokio' ana'guru-na pai' na'uli' -raka: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: tobalu to mpe'ahii' tuwu' -na tohe'e mai, meliu pewai' -na ngkai pewai' to rapuna' hawe'ea tau ntani' -na.
Apa' hira' mewai' ngkai labi ka'uaa' -ra. Tapi' tobine toei, nau' hewa apa-mi kampe'ahii' -na, napewai' omea-mi to ria hi hi'a, nau' kakono-na to naparaluu-hawo hi katuwu' -na eo-eo-na."
Oti toe, malai-imi Yesus ngkai rala Tomi Alata'ala. Ria hadua ngkai ana'guru-na mpo'uli' -ki: "Guru, hilo mpu'u-konae' tomi toe-e! Hilo watu-na! Uma mowo kancola-na!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Nuhilo wa tomi to bohe toe-e lau? Uma mpai' ria hamehaa' watu to bate pomeduncu-na. Bate ragero omea mpai'."
Oti toe, hilou-imi Yesus hi Bulu' Zaitun pai' -i mohura mposinyanyohi-ki Tomi Alata'ala. Petrus, Yakobus, Yohanes pai' Andreas tumai mpololitai-i nto'u uma ria tau ntani' -na.
Ra'uli': "Uli' -kakai ba nto'uma kadupa' -na to nu'uli' toe-e we'i, pai' napa mpai' to jadi' tanda ane hawe'ea toe neo' madupa' -pi."
Na'uli' Yesus: "Pelompehi, neo' -koi ma'ala rabagiu.
Apa' wori' mpai' tauna to mehupa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', alaa-na wori' mpai' tauna to rabagiu.
Mpo'epe-koi mpai' kareba panga'ea ngkai kalaa-na, ni'epe wo'o moni panga'ea to mohu'. Aga neo' me'eka', apa' hawe'ea toe kana jadi' ulu, tapi' kajadia' toe uma mpobatuai karata-nami kahudua dunia'.

Nto'u toe mpai', wori' ngata mosipanga'ei, magau' hadua mpo'ewa magau' kahadua-na. Hiapa-apa ria linu pai' oro'. Aga hawe'ea toe lau lako' pontepu'ua-na-pidi, hewa pontodohaka hadua tobine to neo' mo'ana'.

"Aga koi' tohe'i, mo'inga' -inga' -koi! Apa' koi' mpai' bate rahoko' pai' rakeni hi topohura agama. Raweba' -koi hi rala tomi posampayaa. Rabua' -koi hi topoparenta pai' hi magau' sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Nto'u toe mpai', ria loga-ni mpo'uli' -raka pepangala' -ni hi Aku'.
Pai' Kareba Lompe' kana raparata hi humalili' dunia' kako'ia-na Eo Kiama.

Ane rahoko' -koi pai' rakeni hi topohura, neo' -koi me'eka' ba napa mpai' petompoi' -ni. Ane rata-damo tempo-ni mololita, uli' -mi-hana napa to natu'u Pue' Ala hi rala nono-ni. Apa' napa to ni'uli' nto'u toe, bela ngkai pekiri-ni moto. Lolita-ni tetu mehupa' ngkai Inoha' Tomoroli'.

"Rata mpai' tempo-na hawe'ea tauna mpokahuku' -koi sabana petuku' -ni hi Aku'. Ria mpai' tauna to mpewai' ompi' -ra ba ana' -ra moto bona rapatehi sabana petuku' -ra hi Aku'. Ria wo'o ana' to mpo'ewa totu'a-ra pai' mpopatehi-ra. Aga tauna to tida mepangala' hi Aku' duu' hi ka'omea-na, mporata-ra kalompea' hi eo mpeno.

"Owi nabi Daniel mpolowa karata-na to rahanga' `Topegerohi to dada'a.' (Hema to mpobasa lolita pelowa toe, penotohi mpu'u batua-na!) Jadi', ane nihilo to nalowa Daniel toe mokore hi pokorea to ratagi-ki, agina tauna to mo'oha' hi Yudea metibo' hilou hi bulu' -na.
Tauna to mohura hi parawa-na neo' -pi leba' mesua' hi rala tomi-na mpo'ala' ba napa-napa.
Tauna to hi bonea, neo' -pi nculii' hi ngata mpo'ala' pohea-na. Kaliliu metibo'!
Mpe'ahii' -ra mpai' tobine to nto'u-ra motina'i pai' to mpentii' ana' -ra nto'u toe, apa' mokoro mpai' petibo' -ra.
Mekakae-koi hi Alata'ala bona eo petiboa' -ni toe neo' nto'u tempo lengi'.
Apa' nto'u toe mpai' rata pesesa' to ko'ia ria hangkania jadi' ngkai lomo' -na Alata'ala mpajadi' dunia' rata tempo tohe'i, pai' uma wo'o-pi-hawo mpai' ria jadi' hi eo boko' -na.

Aga naredehi moto mpai' Pue' Ala tempo kaparia toe, apa' ane uma naredehi tempo-na, bate uma ria haduaa to tuwu'. Jadi', apa' napoka'ahi' -ra tauna to napelihi pai' to napobagia, toe pai' naredehi mpai' tempo kaparia toe.
"Nto'u toe mpai', ane ria to mpo'uli' -kokoi: `Hilo, Magau' Topetolo' ohe'i-imi,' ba `Hilo, ohe'e-i mai Magau' Topetolo',' neo' nipangalai'.

Apa' mehupa' mpai' wori' tauna to boa' to mpo'uli' kahira' -na Magau' Topetolo', ba to mpo'uli' kahira' -na nabi. Mpobabehi-ra tanda mekoncehi pai' tanda to mobaraka', bona mpobagiu-ra wori' tauna. Ane ke ma'ala, ntahawe' tauna to napelihi Alata'ala rabagiu wo'o.
Aga koi' tohe'i, mo'inga' -inga' -koi! Ku'uli' ami' -mikokoi hawe'ea tohe'e kako'ia-na jadi'.
"Jadi', nto'u toe mpai', ane timpaliu-pi tempo kaparia toe, hawe'ea anu to mobaraka' hi langi' ralengo. Eo mobali' mobengi, wula uma-pi mehini, betue' roda' ngkai langi'.
Nto'u toe-damo mpai', hawe'ea tauna mpohilo-a, Aku' Ana' Manusia', mana'u tumai hi rala limu'. Uma mowo kabaraka' -ku pai' pehini-ku nto'u toe.
Kuhubui mala'eka-ku hilou mporumpu tauna to kupobagia ngkai humalili' dunia', ngkai wuntu dunia' pai' ngkai wuntu langi'.
"Petonoi-koi napa to kutudui' -kokoi hante lolita rapa' kaju ara. Ane nihilo rau-na mela' pai' mohulu-i, ni'inca-mi kaneo' -na mara eo.
Wae wo'o ane nihilo-damo kajadia' toe we'i lou, ni'inca-mi neo' madupa' mpu'u-mi to ku'uli' we'i.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hawe'ea toe we'i bate madupa' kako'ia-na mate omea tauna to tuwu' tempo toi.
Langi' pai' dunia' mogero mpai', tapi' lolita-ku bate-bate-na duu' kahae-hae-na.

"Aga ane eo pai' jaa kadupa' -na hawe'ea toe, muntu' Tuama-ku-wadi to mpo'inca. Uma ria to ntani' -na to mpo'inca. Bangku' mala'eka to hi suruga-hawoe', uma wo'o-rawo ra'incai. Bangku' Aku' Ana' -nae', uma wo'o-kuwo ku'incai.
Toe pai' kana mo'inga' -inga' pai' mojaga-koi, apa' uma ni'incai tempo kadupa' -na.

Ane rata nculii' -apa mpai', kajadi' -na hewa lolita rapa' tohe'i. Hadua pue' tomi mopatuju hilou hi ngata to molaa. Kako'ia-na me'ongko', nahubui pahawaa' -na mpewili' tomi-na, hore-hore nawai' -ra bago-ra. Hi tompodoo wobo' na'uli' -ki: `Mo'inga' -inga' -koe'!'

Jadi', kana mo'inga' mpu'u-ra, apa' uma ra'incai ba nto'uma karata-na pue' tomi, ba ncimonou' -di ba ntongo' bengi-di ba mepulo ngkii ba nto'u eo mehupa'. Nee-neo' mpai' rata ncorobaa-imi pai' narata-ra bula-ra leta'. Wae wo'o kana mo'inga' -inga' -koi, apa' uma ni'incai nto'uma-a rata.
Napa to ku'uli' -kokoi tohe'i, ku'uli' wo'o hi hawe'ea tauna: Mo'inga' -inga' -hawoe'!"
Ro'eo-damo rata-mi Eo Paskah pai' Posusa' Roti to uma Raragii. Imam pangkeni pai' guru agama bula-ra mpali' akala-ra mpolede Yesus bona rapatehi bongo-i.
Ra'uli': "Aga neo' ulu tababehi nto'u eo bohe, nee-neo' mpai' bara' ntodea."

Nto'u Yesus hi ngata Betania, hilou-i hi tomi hadua tauna to rahanga' Simon topohaki' poko'. Bula-na hi ree, rata hadua tobine ngkeni hameha' butolo' ihia' lana honga to masuli' lia oli-na, to rababehi ngkai rali' kaju to mohonga. Bula-na Yesus ngkoni', tobine toei mpopengka butolo' toe pai' natua hi woo' Yesus bona mpobila' -i.
Ba hangkuja dua to hi ree, moroe-ra mpohilo napa to nababehi tobine toei. Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Napa-mi-hawo kalaua-na lana honga rakerei mara hewa toe!
Ke agina lau-pi-hawo rapobalu' nte oli tolu atu labi doi pera', pai' doi oli-na rawai' -raka tokabu." Toe pai' moroe-ra mpokaroe tobine toei.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka: "Pelele' moto-i-hana. Napa pai' nipedahi nono-na? To nababehi hi Aku' toe-le, lompe'.
Apa' tokabu-hana, ria oa' -ra dohe-ni. Ane dota-koi ntulungi-ra, ria oa' loga-ni. Aga Aku', uma-a mpai' ria oa' dohe-ni.
Tobine toei mpobabehi napa to nakule' mpobabehi. Natuai-a hante lana honga mporodo ami' -mi woto-ku hi karatana-ku mpai', kako'ia-na rata tempo-na.
Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: hi humalili' dunia', hiapa-apa Kareba Lompe' rapalele, napa to nababehi tobine toei bate ralolita, uma mpai' ralipo' -lipo'."
Nto'u toe, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua, to rahanga' Yudas Iskariot, hilou hi imam pangkeni, mpo'uli' -raka patuju-na mpobalu' Yesus hi hira'.
Goe' -ramo mpo'epe patuju-na toe, pai' rajanci-ki rawai' -i doi. Ngkai ree, Yudas mpopali' loga to lompe' mpobalu' Yesus hi bali' -na.

Rata-mi eo to lomo' -na hi Posusa' Roti to Uma Raragii, nto'u bima Paskah rasumale'. Nto'u toe, ana'guru-na Yesus mpo'uli' -ki: "Hiapa-kai mporodo pongkoni' Paskah to takoni' -e mpai'? Hiapa konoa-nu?"
Yesus mpohubui rodua ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi rala ngata. Ria mpai' to mpohirua' -kokoi hadua tomane to ngkeni pontomua' -na oti ntomu'. Tuku' -imi.
Ane mesua' -i hi rala tomi, uli' -ki pue' tomi: `Na'uli' Guru: Hiapa-kuwo pobabehia-ku Posusa' Paskah hante ana'guru-ku?'
Pue' tomi toe mpai' mpotudo' -kokoi hameha' kamar to hi lolo-na to bohe. Kamar toe teporodo ami' -mi, hono' -mi rewa-na. Hi retu-mokoi mpai' mporodo-taka pongkoni' Paskah-ta."
Hilou mpu'u-ramo ana'guru-na to rodua toera mesua' rala ngata. Rarata mpu'u-mi hewa to na'uli' -raka, pai' -ra mporodo-mi pongkoni' Paskah.
Mobengi-mi, rata-imi Yesus hante ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua.
Bula-na mohura ngkoni', na'uli' -mi: "Pe'epei-koi: Ria hadua ngkai koi', to ngkoni' hante Aku' toe lau, to mpobalu' -a mpai' hi bali' -ku."
