Mpo'epe tohe'e, kapeda' -nami nono-ra ana'guru-na, pai' mepekune' -ramo hadua bo hadua hi Yesus, ra'uli': "Bela-hawo aku' to nutoa' -e Pue'?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "To mpobalu' -ale, hadua ngkai koi' to hampulu' rodua tohe'i-e, to mpodulu' -ka.
Makono mpu'u, Aku' Ana' Manusia' bate mate hewa to ralowa hi rala Buku Tomoroli' -e. Aga mpe'ahii' tauna to mpobalu' -a tetui. Ke lompe' lau-pi ane uma-i na'ote tina-na."
Bula-ra ngkoni', na'ala' -mi Yesus roti pai' naposampayai, mpo'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala. Oti toe, napihe-pihe pai' natonu-raka, na'uli': "Ala' -mi, koni' -mi. Toi-mi woto-ku."
Oti toe na'ala' wo'o sangkiri' to ihia' anggur, na'uli' tarima kasi hi Alata'ala pai' natonu-raka. Nginu omea-ramo ngkai sangkiri' toe.
Na'uli' -raka: "Toi-mi raa' -ku to rabowo ane mate-a mpai' bona mpotolo' wori' tauna. Raa' -ku toi mporohoi pojanci to mpoposidai' Alata'ala hante manusia'.

Mpu'u ku'uli' -kokoi: ntepu'u ngkai wae lau, uma-apa nginu anggur duu' -na rata tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Nto'u toe-damo mpai', pai' lako' ku'inu anggur to bo'u hi rala Kamagaua' -na."
Oti toe, morona' -ramo hanyala rona' pe'une'. Kahudu-ra morona', malai-ramo ngkai ngata hilou hi Bulu' Zaitun.

Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Hawe'ea-ni mpai', molengo pepangala' -ni hi Aku', apa' ria te'uki' Lolita Alata'ala to mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kupatehi topo'ewu toei, alaa-na bima-na pagaa' -gaa' -ramo.'
Aga ane tuwu' nculii' -apa mpai', meri'ulu-a hilou hi tana' Galilea, bona hirua' hi ria-ta-damo mpai'."
Na'uli' Petrus: "Nau' hawe'ea tauna molengo pepangala' -ra hi Iko Pue', aku' uma!"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Mpu'u ku'uli' -koko: Bengi toe mpai' lau, kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku."
Aga hangkedi' kanaperohoi-na Petrus lolita-na, na'uli': "Nau' -a mate hangkaa-ngkania dohe-nu, uma mpu'u kusapu kaku'inca-nu!" Wae wo'o-rawo lolita-ra ana'guru-na to ntani' -na.
Rata-ramo hi pampa to rahanga' Getsemani. Hi ree na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka ana'guru-na: "Koi', mohura hi rei-mokoi mpopea-a, bula-ku hilou mosampaya."
Aga Petrus, Yakobus pai' Yohanes nabawai hilou dohe-na. Nto'u toe pepa-mi na'epe pai' mokaratu-mi nono-na.
Na'uli' -raka: "Susa' lia nono-ku, hewa to neo' mate-ama ku'epe. Rehe'i-mokoi ulu mojaga."
Oti toe, hilou-imi molaa hangkedi', pai' -i motumpa hi tana' mosampaya. Rala posampaya-na merapi' -i bona ane ma'ala uma-i-hawo mporata kaparia toe.
Na'uli': "Tuama-ku! Uma ria to uma majadi' ane Iko Mama mpo'uli'. Wi'iha-ka-kuwo kaparia to neo' mporumpa' -a toi. Aga bela konoa-ku Aku' to jadi', agina konoa-nu Iko moto."
Oti toe, nculii' -imi hi ana'guru-na to tolu, narata-ra bula-ra leta' moto. Na'uli' mpo'uli' -ki Petrus: "Simon! Ba leta' -dako-konae! Hajaa-wadi uma nudadahi mojaga?
Mojaga pai' mosampaya-mokoi, bona neo' -koi mporata pesori. Hi rala nono-ni dota moto-koi mpobabehi to makono, aga uma nidadahi apa' manusia' bate lente."
Ngkai ree, hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya. Posampaya-na toe hibalia hante posampaya-na to lomo' -na.
Oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi mporata ana'guru-na, leta' wo'o-ra-wadi apa' mopoke' rahi mata-ra. Nakehele-ra, aga uma-ra winihi apa' uma ra'incai ba napa to ra'uli' -ki.

Hilou wo'o-imi mosampaya katolu ngkani-na, pai' oti toe, nculii' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na, na'uli' -raka: "Turu pai' leta' oa' -pada-koi? Naporae' -mi! Rata-mi tempo-na Aku' Ana' Manusia' rapobalu' pai' ratonu hi tauna to dada'a.
Memata-mokoi! Hilo, etu-imi tumai to mpobalu' -a. Kita-mi lou."

Bula-na Yesus mololita-pidi, rata mpu'u-imi Yudas, hadua ngkai ana'guru-na to hampulu' rodua. Pai' dohe-na wori' wo'o tau ntani' -na to ngkeni piho' pai' sumampu. Hira' toe rapahawa' imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi.
Yudas mpo'uli' ami' -miraka tanda bona ra'inca kato'uma-nai Yesus, na'uli': "Hema mpai' to ku'eki, Hi'a-mi. Hoko' -imi, keni-i hilou, jaga lompe' -i."
Jadi', karata-ra hi ree, kahilou-nami Yudas mpohirua' -ki Yesus, na'uli': "Guru!" pai' -i na'eki ntuku' ada-ra to Yahudi.
Katumai-rami tauna to wori' mpohoko' Yesus.
Ngkai ree, hadua tauna to mokore mohu' Yesus mpowute' piho' -na natime-ki batua Imam Bohe, bela mpoholu tilinga-na.
Na'uli' Yesus mpo'uli' -raka tauna to mpohoko' -i: "Ha toperampaki-a toi-e, pai' mingki' tumai-koi ntali piho' pai' sumampu mpohoko' -ae!
Butu eo-na ria moto-a dohe-ni hi Tomi Alata'ala metudui', napa pai' uma-a nihoko' nto'u toe? Aga tohe'i kana jadi', bona madupa' -mi to te'uki' hi rala Buku Tomoroli'."
Ngkai ree, metibo' -ramo hawe'ea ana'guru-na mpalahii-i.
Ria wo'o hadua kabilasa mpotuku' Yesus nto'u toe, motapui' -i-wadi hante abe' to bula. Ria-ra to doko' mpohoko' -i,
toe pai' naroncu-mi abe' -na, pai' -i metibo' molawa.
Ngkai ree, Yesus rakeni hilou hi tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria, morumpu-ramo hawe'ea imam pangkeni, guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na.
Petrus metuku' ngkawao-wadi, duu' -na rata hi berewe tomi Imam Bohe. Hi ria mohura-i moneru dohe topojaga.
Nto'u toe, imam pangkeni pai' hawe'ea topohura agama mpali' sabi' to mpakilu Yesus, bona ngalai' rahuku' mate-i. Aga uma raruai' sala' -na.
Wori' moto sabi' to mpopakilu-i, aga uma hibalia lolita-ra.
Ria ba hangkuja dua to mokore pai' to mosabi' boa', ra'uli':
"Tauna toii, ki'epe-i-kaina mpo'uli' hewa toi: `Kugero Tomi Alata'ala to nawangu manusia', pai' rala-na tolu eo kuwangu to ntani' -na, to bela manusia' mpowangu.'"
Hiaa' posabi' -ra toe, uma wo'o-wadi hibalia.
Kamokore-nami Imam Bohe hi nyanyoa hawe'ea topohura, pai' na'uli' -ki Yesus: "Ha uma nutompoi' -ra to mpakilu-ko toe-e?"
Aga Yesus, uma-i winihi, uma-i metompoi' nau' hamelaa. Hangkani-pi Imam Bohe mpekune' -i: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' Topetolo', Ana' Alata'ala to Moroli'?"
Na'uli' Yesus: "Aku' -mi, pai' nihilo moto-a mpai', Aku' Ana' Manusia', mohura pai' moparenta hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala to Mobaraka', pai' nihilo wo'o-a mana'u tumai ngkai suruga hi rala limu'."
Mpo'epe toe we'i, Imam Bohe mpoheu' baju-na ngkai kamoroe-na, pai' na'uli': "Uma-pi mingki' ria sabi'!
Ni'epe moto-mi-koiwo lolita-na mpokedi' Alata'ala. Beiwa-mi-koiwo kabotu' -ni?" Hibalia-mi kabotu' -ra omea, ra'uli': "Bate masala' -imile, kana rahuku' mate-i!"

Ngkai ree, ria-ra to mpo'uelikui-i, ria wo'o to mpopo'ore' -i: rakaramuai lio-na, raweba' -i, pai' ra'uli' -ki: "Ee nabi! Pe'uli' pe' ba hema to mpoweba' -koe!" Topojaga wo'o-hawo, mehopo' wo'o-ramo-rawo.
Nto'u toe, Petrus hi berewe-pidi. Bula-na hi berewe toe, tumai hadua tobine topobago hi tomi Imam Bohe.
Kampohilo-na Petrus moneru, nanaa-i pai' na'uli' -ki: "Ba iko wo'o-di hadua doo-na Yesus to Nazaret toei-e mai?"
Aga nasapu Petrus, na'uli': "Uma ku'incai-i, pai' uma kupaha ba napa to nu'uli'!" Ngkai ree moderu' -imi hilou mohu' hi wobo' wala. Turua' -mi manu'.
Pehilo wo'o-imi tobine toei, na'uli' -raka tauna to hi ree: "Hi'a tetu wo'o-di doo-na Yesus toei-e mai."
Aga nasapu mperii wo'o-wadi Petrus. Uma mahae ngkai ree, tauna to mokore hi ree mpo'uli' wo'o-miki: "Iko mpu'u-di doo-nae! Apa' to Galilea wo'o-ko-kowo."
Kamosumpa-nami Petrus mpotuna' woto-na, na'uli': "Uma mpu'u ku'incai tauna to ni'uli' tetui!"

Nto'u toe, turua' -mi manu' karongkani-na. Nakiwoi-mi Petrus lolita-na Yesus ngone to mpo'uli' -ki: "Kako'ia-na turua' manu' karongkani-na, mpolia' tolu ngkani-moko mposapu kanu'inca-ku." Kageo' -nami Petrus kaka'utu-utu.
Mepupulo ngkii, hawe'ea topohura agama nte imam pangkeni pai' guru agama pai' totu'a to Yahudi to ntani' -na, mohawa' wo'o-ramo. Rahoo' -imi Yesus, rakeni hilou rabua' hi Gubernur Pilatus.
Mepekune' -i Pilatus: "Ha Iko mpu'u-mi Magau' to Yahudi-e?" Na'uli' Yesus: "Wae mpu'u, hewa to nu'uli' tetu."
Wori' nyala pepakilu to raparata imam pangkeni hi Pilatus.
Toe pai' mepekune' wo'o-i-pidi: "Uma-ko dota metompoi' -e? Wori' nyala-mi to raparata kehi-nu."
Aga Yesus bate uma-pi winihi, alaa-na napokakonce mpu'u Pilatus.
Butu eo bohe Paskah, Pilatus biasa-na mpobahaka hadua tauna to ratarungku', ba hema to raperapi' ntodea.
Hi mpae toe, ria hi rala tarungku' hadua to me'ewa hi topoparenta, to rahanga' Barabas. Barabas pai' doo-na, ria-ramo mpopatehi tauna rala pe'ewa-ra hi topoparenta.
Jadi', morumpu-ramo ntodea, raperapi' hi Pilatus bona nabahaka hadua to ratarungku' hewa to biasa nababehi butu mpae-na.
Napekune' -ra: "Beiwa, dota-koi ane kubahaka-kokoi Magau' to Yahudi toii?"
Pilatus mpo'uli' hewa toe, apa' na'inca ka'uma-na-hawo masala' -i Yesus; imam pangkeni mpotonu Yesus hi hi'a ngkai kamohingi' -ra-wadi.
Aga imam pangkeni mpo'ukei' ntodea, ra'uli' -raka: "Perapi' -koi bona nabahaka-taka Barabas!" Merapi' Barabas mpu'u-ramo.
Ngkai ree, na'uli' wo'o-mi Pilatus mpo'uli' -raka ntodea: "Ane rapa' -na Barabas to kubahaka-kokoi, kupopai-imi tauna to ni'uli' magau' -ni to Yahudi-e?"
Pejeu' -rami ntodea, ra'uli': "Parika' -i!"
Napekune' Pilatus: "Hiaa' napa sala' -na?" Rapesukui lau-mi mejeu': "Parika' -imi!"
Pilatus doko' ngala' nono ntodea, toe pai' nabahaka-miraka Barabas. Oti toe, nahubui-mi tantara-na mpoweba' Yesus pai' natonu-miraka bona raparika'.
Oti toe, tantara mpokeni Yesus hilou hi po'ohaa' -ra to hi rala tomi Gubernur, pai' -ra mpokio' hawe'ea doo-ra tumai.
Ra'uncoi' -imi hante baju to mperelei to hewa baju magau'. Rababehi hameha' songko ngkai walaa to morui to hewa songko magau', pai' rasongkoi-ki.
Oti toe, pai' -i rapopo'ore', ra'uli' -ki: "Wori' tabe, Magau' to Yahudi!"
Woo' -na rapao' hante lua', ra'uelikui-i, pai' motingkua' -ra ntani' hewa to mpobila' -i.
Ka'oti-na rapopo'ore' hewa toe, raroncu-mi baju to mperelei-e we'i, pai' ra'uncoi' nculii' -imi pohea-na ami'. Oti toe, rakeni-imi hilou hi mali ngata bona raparika'.
Hi lengko ohea, hirua' -ra hante hadua tauna to lako' rata hi ngata, pai' rapewuku-ki hi'a-mi mpopaha'a kaju parika' -na Yesus. Hanga' -na Simon to Kirene, tuama-ra hira' Aleksander pai' Rufus.
Ko'ia mahae, rata-ramo hi po'ohaa' to rahanga' Golgota, batua-na Bulu' Banga'woo'.
Hi ree, Yesus rapopo'inui anggur to ragalo pokuli' to rahanga' mur, aga uma-i dota mpo'inu.
Oti toe, tantara mpoparika' -i, pai' -ra mpobagi-bagi pohea-na hante mpotene' undi hewa pompenoa' -ra, ba hema-ra to mporata.
Nto'u karaparika' -na toe, jaa sio mepulo.
Hi kaju parika' -na hi ntoto woo' -na, ria ukia' to mpo'uli' napa to rapakilu-ki, hewa toi moni-na: MAGAU' TO YAHUDI.
Ria wo'o rodua toperampaki raparika' dohe-na, hadua mali ka'ana-na hadua mali ki'ii-na. ((
Jadi', napa to rababehi toe, madupa' -mi lolita Buku Tomoroli' to mpo'uli': "Magau' Topetolo' rapohewa tauna to dada'a."))
Tauna to liu hi ree, ngkololi-ra mpopo'ore' -i, ra'uli': "Hahi Nu'uli' -kona mpogero-ko Tomi Alata'ala pai' nuwangu nculii' rala-na tolu eo!
Ane wae-di, tulungi moto-mi woto-nu! Mana'u-moko ngkai kaju parika' tetu!"
Wae wo'o imam pangkeni hante guru agama ntora mpopo'ore' -i. Momepololitai-ramo ra'uli': "Tau ntani' -na natulungi-ramo. Woto-na moto-pi uma nakulei' ntulungi.
Hiaa' bo ra'uli' Hi'a Magau' Topetolo', Magau' to Israel! Ane tahilo mpu'u-i mana'u ngkai kaju parika' -na toe mai, lako' tapangala' -idi." Ntahawe' tauna to raparika' dohe-na, meruge' wo'o-ra-rawo.
Tebua' -mi eo, muu-mule' mobengi hobo' hi ngata toe rala-na tolu jaa.
Jaa tolu ncimonou', mekio' -imi Yesus napasimuku mpo'uli': "Alata'ala-ku, Alata'ala-ku! Napa pai' nupalahii-a?" Hi rala basa Yahudi hewa toi moni-na: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?"
Ba hangkuja dua to mokore mohu' hi kaju parika' -na mpo'epe pe'au-na toe, ra'uli': "Epe-dile! Mpokio' nabi Elia-i."

Hadua mokeno hilou mpo'ala' hampu'u wunga to hewa lomo', nabangkahi hi rala ue anggur to mo'onco, natu'u hi wuntu hompea pai' napopoju'ui-ki Yesus bona na'inu. Na'uli': "Popea, tahilo ba tumai mpu'u-i Elia mpopana'u-i ngkai kaju parika'!"
Ngkai ree, kame'au-nami Yesus napesukui, pai' modupe' -mi inoha' -na.
Nto'u toe, kain porini-olo' to tetoe hi rala Tomi Alata'ala mobika' ntongo' ngkai lolo-na rata hi une' -na.
Tadulako tantara to mokore mponyanyohi kaju parika' toe mpohilo beiwa kamate-na Yesus. Na'uli': "Ana' Alata'ala mpu'u-i-tawo'!"
Ria wo'o hi ree ba hangkuja dua tobine to menaa ngkawao. Hanga' -na to hadua, Maria Magdalena. To hadua wo'o, Maria tina-ra Yakobus to tu'ai pai' Yoses. Pai' hadua wo'o, Salome.
Tobine toe-ramo to mpotuku' pai' mpotulungi Yesus bula-na hi tana' Galilea. Pai' wori' wo'o-pidi tobine to ntani' -na to mpotuku' Yesus tumai ngkai Galilea rata hi Yerusalem.
Eo karaparika' -na Yesus toe, eo pomporodoa, batua-na, eo kako'ia-na eo pepuea', pai' ntuku' ada to Yahudi ntepu'u ncimonou' toe, rapalii' -mi mobago. Jadi', neo' limpa-mi eo,

tumai-mi hadua tauna to rahanga' Yusuf to Arimatea. Yusuf toei, hadua topohura agama Yahudi to rabila', mahae moto-imi-hana mpopea tempo-na Alata'ala jadi' Magau' hi dunia'. Yusuf mpedahoi' hilou hi Pilatus mperapi' woto-na Yesus.
Konce-i Pilatus mpo'epe kasohi' -na mate Yesus. Toe pai' nakio' -mi tadulako tantara napompekunei' ba mahae-imi Yesus mate.
Kana'epe-na Pilatus lolita tadulako tohe'e, napiliu-imi Yusuf mpo'ala' woto Yesus.

Yusuf mpo'oli kain to bula bona nahompui' -ki. Napopana'u-mi woto-na ngkai kaju parika' pai' naputu' hante kain toe. Oti toe natu'u hi rala daeo' to ralonga' hi panapa bulu' watu, pai' naluli' hameha' watu na'unca-ki wobo' daeo' toe.
Maria Magdalena pai' Maria tina-na Yoses mpetonoi kahiapa-na woto-na Yesus ratu'u.
Katimpaliu-na eo pepuea', Maria Magdalena, Maria tina-na Yakobus, pai' Salome, hilou-ra mpo'oli anu mohonga. Patuju-ra, doko' hilou mpolanai woto-na Yesus hante to mohonga toe.
Jadi', mepupulo ngkii eo Mingku, lako' moweka', hilou-ramo hi daeo'.

Hi lengko ohea momepololitai-ramo, ra'uli': "Hema-mi-tawo to mpotulungi-ta mpoderu' watu po'unca wobo' daeo'?" Apa' watu toe ria bohe lia. Ntaa' we'i, karata-ra hi daeo', rahilo-rawo tederu' -mi watu.
Pesua' -rami hi rala daeo', mpohilo-ra hadua kabilasa mohura tono' mali ka'ana-na, moheai hante pohea to bula. Konce tobine toera mpohilo-i.
Na'uli' kabilasa toei: "Neo' -koi konce! Mpali' Yesus to Nazaret-koi, to mate raparika'. Tuwu' nculii' -imi! Uma-ipi ria hi rehe'i. Hilo karatu'ua-na wengi.

Wae-e lau, hilou-mokoi, uli' -raka Petrus pai' ana'guru-na to ntani' -na katuwu' -na nculii' -mi. Uli' -raka hewa toi: Hilou meri'ulu-i hi tana' Galilea. Hi ria-damo mpai', pai' -i nihilo, hewa to oti na'uli' -kokoi wengi."
Pehupa' -ra tobine toera ngkai rala daeo', pokeno-rami metibo', apa' wulunga pai' moridi' -ramo. Uma-ra ulu mpololitai hema-hema, apa' ngkai kame'eka' -ra.
Pemata-na Yesus ngkai kamatea mepupulo ngkii hi eo Mingku, lomo' -na mpopehuwu-i woto-na hi Maria Magdalena. Maria tohe'ei, ria-i Yesus mpopalai pitu seta to mpohawi' -i.
Hilou-imi Maria hi topetuku' -na Yesus, narata-ra bula-ra geo' pai' peda' nono-ra. Na'uli' -raka: "Tuwu' nculii' -imi-hana Pue', kuhilo-imi we'i!" Aga uma raparasaya hawe'ea to najarita Maria toe.
Oti toe, Yesus mpopehuwu wo'o-mi woto-na hi rodua topetuku' -na bula-ra mako' hilou hi mali ngata. Nto'u toe, lence-na mobali', alaa-na uma ra'incai Kayesus-na.
Ponculi' -rami to rodua toera mpo'uli' -raka doo-ra kampohilo-ra Yesus. Aga uma wo'o raparasaya.

Ngkai ree, mehupa' wo'o-imi hi ana'guru-na to hampulu' hadua bula-ra ngkoni'. Nakamaro-ra apa' kura' pepangala' -ra pai' motu'a nono-ra. Nau' ria-mi tauna to mpohilo-i, uma oa' -ra dota mparasaya katuwu' -na nculii' mpu'u-imi.
Na'uli' -raka: "Hilou-mokoi hi humalili' dunia', mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hi hawe'ea tauna.
Hema to mepangala' pai' raniu', tehore-ra ngkai huku' jeko' -ra. Aga hema to uma mepangala' bate rahuku'.
Pai' hema to mepangala', kuwai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda-tanda to hewa toi: Hante hanga' -ku mpopalai-ra seta. Mololita-ra hante basa to uma ra'incai ngkai baraka' Inoha' Tomoroli'.
Ria-ra to ngkamu ule, ba paia-na nginu rasu, aga uma moto-ra moapa. Mpojama-ra tauna to peda', bona mo'uri' -ra topeda'."
Ka'oti-na Pue' Yesus mpololitai-ra, te'ongko' -imi hilou hi suruga, pai' -i mohura hi mali ka'ana Alata'ala.
Ngkai ree, topetuku' -na hilou mpopalele Kareba Lompe' hiapa-apa. Pue' mobago hangkaa-ngkania dohe-ra, pai' nawai' -ra kuasa mpobabehi tanda mekoncehi bona mporohoi kamakono-na Kareba to rakeni.
